comments: The best at all amongst all other players that are available on the Google play store in terms of performance, UI, them, visualizer, customizing options, beautiful animations, very elegant,  It feels so much better, But one only thing that I didn't love is that it can't change and song or album info although the option of change tags is available but It doesn't work, it seems working on it self I mean u can see the changes only in powerramp but u can't see that in other apps Which's not good

Please add the A-B repeat option. That's the only thing that this app needs. I cannot explain the how good is this app in words because there are so many of them. The first app on Google Play which I bought. Because this app just suite my usage and option I am looking for and the price is also too reasonable and low.

INCONSISTENT. They're constantly changing the settings (for the worse). Has way TOO MANY options, & most don't work properly. Paid for this years ago, & used to love it. Has gotten progressively worse, & I'm FED UP with having to reconfigure the player every time, to simply play my f%@#!n music. UPDATE 3/7/20: Now that I left a bad review, player mysteriously deleted 1/2 of my 4500 mp3s before I shut my phone off to stop it. Thank God I have them backed up on my computer. F.U. PowerAmp !!!

The OG...been using power amp since the 90's, still great! Bought the app for my first smart phone and have been getting massive amounts of use from it since, feels kinda cheap on my end honestly, I spent $4 like 15 years ago and this is still my favorite music app and it will be yours too once you get used to it, very powerful player with huge amounts of options and deep control. Huge fan of the app and the company, you won't regret use this and like me you'll end up buying it eventually!

Before the forced Android 10 update from AT&T this app worked fine on my Note 9. Now, however, every time I plug my phone into a TV (using a HDMI connection) the player just starts playing automatically at full volume. It is totally annoying. I have the poweramp paid version. Also I have the poweramp widget on my home screen. After you fix this, I will change my review from 3 to 5 stars.

description:

Enjoy the easiest and most convenient free player on mobiles with the same reputation as GOM Media Player!

We support all basic functions.
We support non-encoding, speed control, finger gesture, subtitle management, section movement, light control, etc.

comments: Overall, does the job. A few tweaks would be nice. I'm not exactly as agile as a cat, but when the song changes with each step I take, the 'change song by shaking phone' function might be a wee bit sensitive. I'm scared to try it while driving, with all the potholes. And there's no way to change the mustard yellow colour, which is unfortunate. For basic functions, though, a solid music player.

It would be nice if I actually could experience the app before it asks me to give a rating. I have no idea whether or not I like it yet. I literally opened the app, clicked on playlist, then tried to click back page to return to all music; then came the ask to give you a 5-star. Therefore i am asking you, how about writing an algorithm that allows a person at least 5 minutes to give 5 stars? This action may actually get you a proper review.

It's a good app with sleep timer, playlists, smart share and other great features. I rated it four stars because of its limited song sorting and categorizing abilities. For example, there is no way to sort songs by genre, sub-genre, or nearly any of the ways that you can do so in iTunes or some of the better music players.

I searched forever to find my old app it used to let me edit song details when it would download showing artist as song title or had numbers that shouldn't be there then it updated and quit editing and all older edits went back . I found this one and it was easier to fix the details it didnt let me accidentally change the song each time and just easier. So far I love it thanks.

As soon as I opened the app I started having problems with it automatically picking songs and playing them when I didn't want it to. And then when I exited out of the app, it wouldn't let me close it or stop the music. Uninstalled after having it 5 min

title: Musicolet Music Player [Free, No ads]
description:
------------------------------------
PLEASE READ THIS BEFORE INSTALLING
1. This app plays only local audio files (mp3 etc) that you already have. This app does not support music streaming or downloading.
2. As this app doesn't have internet permission, It can't have any feature that uses internet.
------------------------------------


Musicolet is simple, light yet powerful music player with all essential music playing features with some advance features like...

✅ Multiple Queues
Now it is possible to create/manage one Queue while listening songs from another Queue. Musicolet is the only music player in android market which supports multiple Queues. You can create maximum 20 Queues.


✅ Simple GUI with Minimalistic design & Easy navigation
For fast and easy navigation we placed all important components of the app (like Main player, Queues, Folders, Albums, Artists, Playlists) in just one row. So you can access them with just 1-Tap!


✅ Tag editor+: Can edit tags and album-arts of multiple songs at once.


✅ Move/Copy songs, Rename folders directly in app


✅ Folder browsing 📁
2-types of folder structures: 1) Linear (all folders at once) and 2) Hierarchical(folders within folders)


✅ Powerful Equalizer🎚🎚🎚: Separate presets and settings for Speakers🔊, Headphones🎧, Bluetooth etc.


✅ Gapless playback


✅ 🎧Earphone controls🎧
Single click for pause/play. Double click for next and Triple click for previous song. On each press >=4 you can Fast-Forward the song.


✅ Embedded Lyrics + LRC support
Supports offline lyrics embedded in audio file as ID3 tag. You can edit embedded lyrics from ID3 tag editor. Musicolet also support .lrc files for synced lyrics. 
(Note: Musicolet doesn't fetch lyrics automatically from internet. You have to manually write or paste lyrics in tag editor, if there is no embedded lyrics. It doesn't fetch lrc file automatically. For lrc files, You have to find lrc file from internet, put it in the same folder and rename to exactly match it with audio file name manually.)


✅ Sleep timers
2 types: 1) close app after hh:mm time or 2) close app after N songs.


✅ Add shortcuts of any album/artist/folder/playlist to your HomeScreen (Launcher) app.


✅ Stunning Widgets
Control music right from your home screen with awesome looking widgets, without opening the app.


✅ Lock Screen (with controls, Queue and Lyrics)


✅ 🚘 Android Auto support 🚘
From your 'Android Auto' enabled car, you can control music and access your playlists, queues, folders and whole music library.


✅🎉Change notifications appearance🎉
✅ You can also enable Fast-Forward and rewind buttons in notifications from settings.


✅ Light and dark themes


✅ Backup and Restore
Automatic and Manual backups. Restore settings, playlists, play-counts from any backup anytime on any device.



And much more...




🚫No Ads🚫


No internet permission, Completely offline
Musicolet doesn't even use Internet permission (a.k.a. network access permission). (You can check this in 'App permissions' at the bottom of this description in Play Store.) So it cannot send/receive even a single bit of data to/from the internet. Not even in background. Full respect of your privacy.



Dedicated to Music lovers 🎶 all around the world. 🌎
Created with love ❤, lots of code and sleepless nights. Hope you will like our work.




------------------------------------
To send feedback/suggestions, report bugs or for other queries...
Contact us: musicolet@krosbits.in

comments: I absolutely love this app, definitely recommend! The widget works great, no glitches or issues. Honestly this music player has so many features I can't name them all. The main reason I am so pleased with it is because I spent a solid hour downloading multiple different music player apps (Samsung music, Free Music Player, Stellio Music Player, PI MusicPlayer, etc) but none of these could locate the songs I had stored on my SD card.. Except this one! Thank you so much for such a great app.

You won't believe, but it is true that I haven't used any other music player since 2017. Best thing is that the developers are not greedy, so there is no ads. Even it is a small sized app but it doesn't lack any feature that a music player should have. I can't explain how much I love this app. Just more than what I expected. Not paid apps are able to do this. I am proud to be an Indian 😘😘😘😘❣️❣️

My search for a music player has come to an end! I am a very suspicious person, so i don't like apps that request for features they traditionally wouldn't need (calculator app requesting for location info, music player requesting for internet access, etc). I don't don't really have need for the extra perks that comes with. This player simply plays your music. Period! I love a minimalist look. No fancy themes, picture backgrounds and stuff. I love some color though. Life is colorful 😊 This app is pure and simple. No one loves apps that take forever to load. That's why we are always updating our gadgets to the latest, fastest, and most efficient ones. Since this player does not have all the extra features that most music players have, of all music player apps I've tried, this one loads the fastest, by a big margin. A plus if you have less than 2GB RAM (have used it on a 1GB phone and it was flawless). Most of all, the things i can do with this app in terms of organizing the music on my phone is simply UNBELIEVABLE. Even if it failed in every area as I've explained, with what i can do... I would still persevere having it. I can move music to different folders, remember last played position for any track (just what i need for my 2+ hr reggae mixes), and the list goes on and on. If you are like me, try it. You just might like it. If you like fancy themes, this may not be for you.

App is great... truly grateful. Alright...so I've changed my handset, after installation of application I'm not able to change the album art. For eg:- if I want to keep some random image for the song being played... it's not working. It gives me option to select the image from the gallery but after selection it goes back to normal musicolet logo. Need some solution on this... kindly revert.

After Android 10 update in my Realme device, i am unable to play music smoothly and sometimes volume remains high all the time which cannot be adjusted. Please fix this issue soon. I am using this app for more than a year and truly impressed by the features it provides, especially the equalizer which can be tuned according to our needs.

title: Stellio - Music player, mp3 player
description:
A leader among players.
The highest quality sound and convenient, aesthetically pleasing interface.

Why Stellio?
Stellio is advanced player, with powerful sound, support of themes, big variety of sound settings.

The main goal in development was to get sound of highest quality. This goal is accomplished by introducing powerful audio engine which controls 12-bands equalizer and big variety of audio effects. The player gives complete freedom for experementations, using it manually or by presets.

Crossfade makes sound more pleasing — smooth switch from one song to another. Gapless is the opposite, playback of tracks without the smallest gaps between.

In addition to powerful settings, there're a lot of different useful abilities in the player:

- Lyrics. View lyrics from internet with offline access after.
- Choose a cover. Use convenien search of covers from internet or trust it to the player.
- Edit tags. Put names in order with help of the handy tag editor.
- Music categories. Play music by Albums, Artists, Genres or Folders.
- A lot of audio formats. In addition to popular audio formats, FLAC, MP3, CUE, APE, M4A and others are supported.
- Android Wear support. Control music from your watches, pick a track, all without taking a phone out of a pocket!
- The best sound. Playback of music in high resolution.
- Sleep timer. Set sleep timer for certain amount of tracks or minutes.
- Huge amount of settings, like list animation or lock screen
- Widgets and notifications. Change appearance of widgets and notifications.
- Convenient control. Switch track with help of a headset, shake the phone or by volume buttons.

Themes
The power of the player is packed in the most convenient interface. We pay special attention to design — every detail is well thought through. Out unique feature is changing color of elements to match the cover of a track for deeper immersion in music atmosphere. Exactly because of it the chameleon is on the icon of Stellio.

For those want more than standard appearance, there's ability to pick different interface among additional themes, which not simple change color, but completely reincarnate appearance of the player!

Enjoy uncompromising sound quality from your pocket. Stellio is a perfect app for Android. Sound quality can't be described by words, so it is time to open the player for yourself and enjoy musical power of Hi-Res quality.

comments: I've been searching for a decent music playing app for Android and have failed miserably until now. This app is great—beautiful interface, organizes well, allows you to change metadata, and lots and lots of customization options. The best thing is that it actually reads the cover art for each song correctly, as I've had apps in the past that confuse album art of same-name albums by different artists or artists with multiple albums. The only thing I wish it had was a "list view" for albums and artists or a way to click and drag the scroll bar. It can take a while to scroll to a particular artist without these features. But overall, I love it!

It's a great music player, but I've run into a really weird problem with it when using Bluetooth to connect to my car's media player. If I use Stellio to play media the connection is extremely unstable. If a song is playing I can't connect reliably at all. The song might play for seconds at a time, then the connection is lost, it reconnects, only to be lost again moments later. Edit: Translate Song Metadata is already activated. So this is unfortunately not the solution.

This music player has so much potential and it's really good. The thing it needs is an option to disable/enable some of the side options like genres, artists, folders, albums, etc since I don't use some of them. Also while in the playlists option, there needs to be a way to sort the playlists in alphabetical order and there should be a list view option in playlist instead of the grid view that it shows. Other then that, this is one of the best music players in the play store hands down.

Okay, awesome player! Covers do download but this is the only issue can't stand from this player. They take forever and ever, to just get the covers downloaded. I have a 400 gb micro sd card. Again I have 22,000+ songs with full albums of all discographies of artists but still other players do not take this long for covers, and other players have option to use already in file covers too. So this could be why it takes so long because of the no option for preferred covers from file instead. I guess I will have to every once in a while leave the connection on to finish downloading covers. What hassle but oh well. This is on a 75 Mbps connection too.

It is my favorite player app, but since a few updates There is a problem, which is that when you enter the app after a few minutes, a notification appears saying that you have to update the theme (Jfrost) to continue using it. I already have it updated and it is annoying that every time i entered the app that notification still appears. Edit: thanks for the Tip, I tried and it didn't work. however I tried uninstalling and installing and it worked. thanks!

title: NRG Player music player
description:
NRG Player - beautiful music player for Android with an equalizer that plays songs from folders and has customizable user interface. 

Main features:
  
• Popular music format playback
Listen to songs in more  than 20 popular formats.

• Lossless formats (.FLAC, .ALAC, .APE)
Listen to tracks in formats without quality loss, which your default music player couldn’t  play before. Our application has it’s own audio engine.

• 10 band graphic equalizer with presets
Choose standard presets or create your own. To open it tap EQL button on the right bottom corner. Then tap on On/Off button to switch it on/off.

• Sound effects
Get the best quality from your headphones using them with flexible effects. Open equalizer and swipe to the second tab with effects.
   
• Custom interface colors and background
Change look and feel depending on your own style. Express yourself! To customize your interface tap options menu (small gear in the top right corner or menu button on your device). Then tap on Settings -> Look and feel -> “Colors and Background” or “Skins” to change whole look of the player.

• Convenient circle rewind for audiobooks and podcasts
Tweak rewind speed for easy navigation in long tracks. Open Settings -> Controls -> Rewind speed. For example, x1/8 speed allows you to rewind in 8 full circles instead of one. It makes your navigation eight times easier.

• Volume buttons playback control
Switch tracks with volume buttons. You don’t need to pull out your phone from your pocket. It’s a great way to use NRG Player for sport. To switch on this feature open Settings -> Controls -> Volume buttons.

• Switch folders, albums or artists in one motion
Open media library by tapping on ADD button in the left bottom corner. Find your favorite directory, album or artist and tap on small play triangle button on the left side of the list item. Return to the main screen. Now you can swipe to the right or to the left on the playback queue to switch. Use NRG Player as your music player for car.
 
• Play all your collection in three taps
1. Tap on ADD button to open media library.
2. Tap on “Songs” tab
3. Tap on play icon in the left side of any item in the list
Playback queue will be created automatically for you. You can switch on "random" on the main screen (above forward button).

• Unique playlist system
You can select tracks in 5 categories: folders, songs, albums, artists and genres. Add them all to playlist in one touch. There are no borders between directories and media library anymore. Just press ADD button on the left bottom corner. Then tap on checkboxes on the right side of any list item. When you select everything you want just press “Add” or “Play” button.

• Home screen and lock screen widgets
You can choose one of three home screen widgets: 4x1, 4x2, 4x3, and one lock screen widget!

• Headset support
Leave your device in the pocket! You can tweak your headset on the Settings screen: Settings -> Controls -> Headset.
 
• Id3 tags editor
You don't need to edit every track if you want to change album or artists title. Just open tag editor in album or artist category. To do that open music library, select required tab and make a long press on a list item to open context menu. Then just select “Edit tags” option. All changes will be applied automatically.

• Sleep timer
Don’t worry about sleeping with player on. It’s turn off automatically by sleep timer. To open sleep timer tap on Settings -> Controls -> Sleep timer.

Use support@nrgplayer.com for bug reports.
descriptionHTML:
NRG Player - beautiful music player for Android with an equalizer that plays songs from folders and has customizable user interface.

Main features:

• Popular music format playback
Listen to songs in more than 20 popular formats.

• Lossless formats (.FLAC, .ALAC, .APE)
Listen to tracks in formats without quality loss, which your default music player couldn’t play before. Our application has it’s own audio engine.

• 10 band graphic equalizer with presets
Choose standard presets or create your own. To open it tap EQL button on the right bottom corner. Then tap on On/Off button to switch it on/off.

• Sound effects
Get the best quality from your headphones using them with flexible effects. Open equalizer and swipe to the second tab with effects.

• Custom interface colors and background
Change look and feel depending on your own style. Express yourself! To customize your interface tap options menu (small gear in the top right corner or menu button on your device). Then tap on Settings -> Look and feel -> “Colors and Background” or “Skins” to change whole look of the player.

• Convenient circle rewind for audiobooks and podcasts
Tweak rewind speed for easy navigation in long tracks. Open Settings -> Controls -> Rewind speed. For example, x1/8 speed allows you to rewind in 8 full circles instead of one. It makes your navigation eight times easier.

• Volume buttons playback control
Switch tracks with volume buttons. You don’t need to pull out your phone from your pocket. It’s a great way to use NRG Player for sport. To switch on this feature open Settings -> Controls -> Volume buttons.

• Switch folders, albums or artists in one motion
Open media library by tapping on ADD button in the left bottom corner. Find your favorite directory, album or artist and tap on small play triangle button on the left side of the list item. Return to the main screen. Now you can swipe to the right or to the left on the playback queue to switch. Use NRG Player as your music player for car.

• Play all your collection in three taps
1. Tap on ADD button to open media library.
2. Tap on “Songs” tab
3. Tap on play icon in the left side of any item in the list
Playback queue will be created automatically for you. You can switch on "random" on the main screen (above forward button).

• Unique playlist system
You can select tracks in 5 categories: folders, songs, albums, artists and genres. Add them all to playlist in one touch. There are no borders between directories and media library anymore. Just press ADD button on the left bottom corner. Then tap on checkboxes on the right side of any list item. When you select everything you want just press “Add” or “Play” button.

• Home screen and lock screen widgets
You can choose one of three home screen widgets: 4x1, 4x2, 4x3, and one lock screen widget!

• Headset support
Leave your device in the pocket! You can tweak your headset on the Settings screen: Settings -> Controls -> Headset.

• Id3 tags editor
You don't need to edit every track if you want to change album or artists title. Just open tag editor in album or artist category. To do that open music library, select required tab and make a long press on a list item to open context menu. Then just select “Edit tags” option. All changes will be applied automatically.

• Sleep timer
Don’t worry about sleeping with player on. It’s turn off automatically by sleep timer. To open sleep timer tap on Settings -> Controls -> Sleep timer.

Use support@nrgplayer.com for bug reports.
summary: Music player with equalizer, support lossless and adjustable user interface.
developerAddress: 8A The Drive, Epsom, Auckland, New Zealand
recentChanges: - fixed minor bugs
comments: Best music player ever, cool design, great sound & awesome features. Registered with a monthly subscription from the first 2 minutes of usage. You can delete files from within the app, music loads fast, browsing and sorting is intuitive. The only negative thing I found: it looses star ratings after you move the rated files around, so it must have its own database for storing the ratings instead of appending them to the file. All in all great app.

Well it's a great app and everything else but it needs to be updated for the new Android updates and it should read all the music to your phone because I have a 256gb SD card and dont read helf the music from micro sd at all that issue needs fixed

It would be an awesome app and get 5 stars from me if the equalizer worked like it should. From when I first installed the app equalizer worked fine until 2nd song started and then it started sounding like equalizer off but says its on. After trying to make adjustments to no avail, I had to exit out of app and then open again...equalizer will work through maybe a couple songs and then just turn off or stop working. Fix this please cuz it's a great music player...and too many ads also. Thanks.

Overall a good app. However when used in parallel with Runtastic app, the player often stops playing music after the Runtastic gives audio comments. And there is no obvious pattern when it happens: we are talking about Runtastic comments that come after every kilometer of running is completed - sometime the player stops after 5km, sometimes after 7-8km, and almost always it stops at 12km and continues to do so every following kilometer. Very unpleasant and distracts from sport as the music has to be restarted so often. Same on Android 4 or 5 and 9.

I was looking for a music player app that would work on a android tablet that could simulate a car stereo interface. NRG is the closest that I have found so far. My only wish is that I could have the option, in landscape mode,of just seeing the current song playing. I am still planning on purchasing this app because the buttons are large and the ease of the ability to change playlist while driving.

yes this app has good fethuers its a good app to store your music and movies you have the side window so you can watch a movie while browsing another and it has a built in equaliser for your music its no good the video player is getting worser by the second if you dont know about the v.w be in for a surprise

This app would be awesome if it could actually play videos. I can see all 10 hard drives on my HTPC, but out of more than 12,000 videos and movies, I can't play anything whatsoever. No mp4, avi, flv, mov, wtv, NOTHING!
So far was satisfied and still is, player run smoothly like pro, no ads interuption, highly recommended.

Disappointed. I've used this player for years. Now it turns off without notice. The screen turns completely dark. I sometimes think maybe I changed the settings to night mode and I haven't. Emailed for help and never received a response. Hate to move on, but it's not what it used to be.

title: Video Player All Format - Full HD Video Player
description:
Video player for all formats gives the list of features to easily manage and play videos and songs.


KEY FEATURES:
● Support ALL video formats, including MKV, MP4, M4V, AVI, MOV, 3GP, FLV, WMV, RMVB, TS, etc.
● Ultra HD video player, supports 4K and all types of video formats.
● Hardware acceleration and Extension mode(HW+)
● Playback Speed and Dual Audio support
● Sleep timer in Video and Music player
● Manage audio files, video files, and photo albums. 
● Online trending videos.
● Video player HD for both an android tablet and an android phone.
● Search all media files, create a playlist, search artists, albums, genre, etc.
● Cropping feature in Albums section
● Filter video folders and song folders.
● Manage Recently played videos and songs, resume and start over option in the video player.
● Support Subtitle downloader and more.
● Play video in the pop-up window and Play-In background as an audio file.
● Night Mode to protect eyes from blue light, Quick Mute option in Player screen.
● Identify ALL video files on your device and SD Card automatically.
● Manage or share videos, songs, and photos easily.
● Easy to control volume, brightness and playing progress.
● Multi-playback option: Pinch to zoom, auto-rotation, aspect-ratio, screen-lock etc.
● Multiple Theme settings.
● Equalizer with Bass Boost and Virtualizer 
● Create and manage Playlist 
● Video hider for private videos files.


All Format Video Player
Play all format videos, including MKV, MP4, M4V, AVI, MOV, 3GP, FLV, WMV, RMVB, TS, etc.

Full HD Video Player
Play HD, Full HD, 4k and all types of video files smoothly.


Background Video Player
Play videos in the background option on the video player screen.
Enjoy video on the background just like a music playback. Now you can watch a video in the way of listening to books.


Floating Video Player
Video popup enables multitasking. The floating video player overrides other apps and it can be moved and resized easily. Enjoy video on the split-screen and use other apps as usual.


Video Player for android phones
Support all devices, watch videos on both an android tablet and an android phone.

Video player with complete control in media files
Recently played video queue, create playlist, filter duplicate media files, search video and songs, manage photo albums. 

Easy to use
Easy to control brightness, volume and playing progress by sliding on the playback screen. 
Manage playing queue with a swipe - reorder and dequeue videos from the playlist.
Equalizer with Bass Boost and Virtualizer 


Filter duplicate video, photos, and files.
Identify ALL video files on your device and SD Card automatically. In addition, Filter duplicate images, photos, and videos and delete them to make free space in Sd card, select multiple and share videos and all media files easily.


Required Permission Details:
–––––––––––––––––––
READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission is required in order to read your media files in your primary & secondary storage.

 WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission is required in order to rename or deletion of files and to store the downloaded subtitles.

ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE and ACCESS_WIFI_STATE permissions are required in order to get the network status which is required for various activities like online videos, subtitle searching and downloading subtitle of videos, license checking, update checking.

 GET_ACCOUNTS permission is required to get online videos from youtube API's

 DRAW OVER OTHER APPS  permission is required for the floating window player.

Rocks video player all format is a totally FREE Full HD video player for android. This is an all-in-one media player for different formats. We are open to any suggestions for a better user experience. Please feel free to contact us at feedback.rocksplayer@gmail.com

comments: The app greets you with a 15 second ad. Deleted before I even tried it.
Got what I came for. Was able to play the video my device could not. Shows some ads before and after long videos, but none during, which makes it ok.
Overall it is intuitive. Runs smoothly with no hiccups. Would rather it not jump right to the next video without asking first. Would like to be able to auto mark a video as watched once completed.
Works mpst of the time, but just don't pause it because you wont be able to resume!!
I've downloaded more popular and complicated mp4 players,but this one is simple to use and it clearly shows what videos you have. Excellent app

title: Perfect Player IPTV
description:
Perfect Player is set-top box style IPTV/Media player for watching videos on TVs, tablets and smartphones.

The app doesn't contain any channels, you need to add Playlists in Settings for this.
Note: To get the best playback experience try different Decoder options in Settings.

Features:
- Nice OSD menus and infos for easy and pleasant watching videos with minimum user actions
- Scaleable OSD renders correctly with any screen resolution and selected font size
- IPTV watching with channels groups, logos and EPG
- Local files watching (from SDCard, USB, etc)
- Supported playlist formats: M3U, XSPF
- Supported EPG formats: XMLTV, JTV
- udpxy (UDP-TO-HTTP proxy) server support
- Can connect to IPTV data server (Perfect Player's PC version) to fetch playlist, EPG, logos and the ability to request playlist update right away by specifying only IPTV data server address in Settings
- Can be controlled by remote control, mouse, keyboard, etc
- Supports Perfect Cast IPTV - remote control app designed exclusively for Perfect Player
- Big controls panel is useful on devices with small screen size (toggle the panel with the two fingers touch)
- Extended EPG info viewing
- "Full version" removes Ads and adds extra features

comments: I have used the app for a year and half. No problems, very smooth to work with. I have encountered a problem. I subscribed to TDS Host which is a streamlined network of many channels which I really like. It has been a number of days and cannot watch anything, The channel list appears, but url is not. I contacted the TDS HOST people and they say everything is good on their side . My tv is also in good shape. Any thoughts?

Good app but lost two stars for two very important issues. The first is, there is no exit/and button. Have to go to main screen on phone. Please include an exit/end button on next update. This has been an issue for several people. Second issue in no support for fire devices. I have several fire cubes I would like to run this on, but can not get the paid version to work. I paid, but since fire uses the Amazon account, can not get ad free ( no Amazon version of app).

Definitely one of the best. On my Nvidia Shield (Tube) is does crash and fail to open again regularly. I have to clear all data to get it to reopen. Also you can't copy and paste into the URL boxes for playlist and guide PLEASE ENABLE THIS! you can currently only paste into the description box but the shield app doesn't recognise the URL box as a text box! Combined with the frequent crashing this makes re adding the URLs very painful.

Used this app for a few years faultlesly and its been my go to app i really like it, seems to be issue tho with the new 4k firestick and channels with a higher bit rate on this app tho, glitchy and crashes it, i have informed app developer and hopefully he can fix this

Good player. But interface is different from others. Use on Sony Bravia. Wish list: Buttun SELECT do pause. Button BACK do back to tv guide and stop video. Please change it's more intuitive. Perfect for 4k videos

title: AIMP
description:
ATTENTION!
1. App does not have built-in music library and uses old school playlist-based approach to music playback
2. App may works incorrectly on devices based on M.I.U.I or E.M.U.I firmwares.

Please, report about all bugs into our forum: http://www.aimp.ru/forum/index.php?board=141.0 or write mail to support.

+ Supported formats: AAC, APE, DFF, DSF, FLAC, IT, M4A, M4B, MO3, MOD, MP2, MP3, MP4, MPC, MPGA, MTM, OGG, OPUS, S3M, TTA, UMX, WAV, WEBM, WV, XM
+ Support of Android Auto and custom Car PCs
+ Support of OpenSL / AudioTrack / AAudio output methods
+ Support of CUE Sheets
+ Balance control
+ Playback speed control
+ 29-band graphic equalizer
+ Sleep Timer

+ Themes: custom themes support
+ Themes: built-in light, dark and black themes
+ Themes: an ability to customize theme hue
+ Themes: support of night / day mode

+ Bookmarks
+ User defined playback queue
+ Automatic detection of tags encoding
+ Album Arts support (from tags / from file folder / from the Internet)
+ Multiple playlists
+ Smart-playlists based on folders
+ Internet radio
+ Lyrics support
+ HTTP Live Streaming

+ An ability to cross-fade tracks
+ An ability to down mix multi-channels audio files to stereo
+ An ability to down mix audio files to mono (optional)
+ An ability to register playing track as ringtone from player
+ An ability to repeat playlist / track / playback without repeating
+ An ability to control playback from notification area
+ An ability to control playback via gestures in album art area (optional)
+ An ability to control playback via headset
+ An ability to switch the tracks via volume buttons (optional)
+ Volume normalization using replay gain or peak-based normalization

+ An ability to delete files physically
+ An ability to sort files by template / manually
+ An ability to group files by template
+ An ability to search files in filtering mode
+ An ability to share audio files

+ An ability to add to playlist only chosen files / folders
+ An ability to play files from the File Manager applications
+ An ability to play files from Windows shared folders (only v1 and v2 of samba protocol are supported)

+ Integration with standard lock screen
+ Widget for the desktop
+ Widget for the notification area

* Player: upper limit of speed control has been increased to 3x
* Player: added support of the file:// protocol in Album Art downloader module
- Fixed: issues from incoming crash-reports
comments: Pretty good high quality digital audio player app for what it is. UI is a little dated, but it's features and easy to use access far outweigh the flaws. Overall really great app. Update: They have updated the UI, making it look fresh and clean, and there are even more features such as customization. I'm moving my rating from 4* to 5*.

This is a FANTASTIC app! Sounds way better than a standalone mp3 player and with many, many more options, FOR FREE. I just spent close to an hour working through the equalizers, options, and getting everything dialed in on my AudioTechnica headphones and the sound quality is unbelievable! I will never buy a standalone mp3 player ever again. I would gladly pay money for this app. You won't be disappointed.

The AIMP player produces very good, nice and natural sounds it's very near to the hi-res sound. After searching and trying hundreds of music player, I've found that the AIMP player is way way better than any other music player apps. Perhaps it's the best music player you can have for free. Keep the good work, and many thanks to the developer team because its still free and no ads at all. Thank you very much. Maybe I would buy the pro version with a lot of features packed there.

Absolutely great, love it However, since the last update I can't export playlists to my SD card anymore.. I get a popup saying "Java.IO.FileNotFoundException" edit: It does have storage permissions and I manually gave it permission to the root of the card but i get a toast message afterwards: java.io.FileNotFoundException: EACCES (Permission denied) Android Version: 10 Security Patch Level: Jan 1, 2020 Google Play System Update: 2020-02-01

sorting musics could be a bit better, like auto detecting song , albums ,etc .... other than that IT IS THE STRONGEST MUSIC PLAYER FOR ANDROID . I mean for real it is. it has a clean theme , the strongest equalizer and so on... It's been a long time that I'm using AIMP on my laptop , now my mobile's default music player is AIMP as well 😘👌🏻

title: Google Play Music
description:
Google Play Music provides free, ad-supported radio for what you’re doing, how you’re feeling, or what you want to hear. Instantly start radio stations based on songs, artists, or albums, or browse by genre, mood, activity, decade, and more. Bring your own music collection with you by uploading 50,000 of your own songs; then listen to them across Android, iOS, and the web, for free.

Subscribe to get on-demand access to millions of songs and download anything to listen even when you’re not connected - or sign up for the family plan on Android to provide access for up to six family members for one low price. Plus, subscriptions come with YouTube Music Premium membership, so you can enjoy YouTube Music ad-free, in the background, and offline.

Free features:
*Radio curated by experts for anything you want to hear
*Store up to 50,000 songs from your personal music collection
*Discover and subscribe to podcasts
*Smart recommendations based on your taste
*Listen on Android, iOS, and the web

Subscription-only features:
*The family plan, where up to six family members can enjoy Google Play Music for one low price.
*On-demand access to over 35 million songs
*YouTube Music Premium membership (see music.youtube.com/music_premium for details)
*Download music to your device and listen when you’re not connected
*Ad-free, uninterrupted listening

Learn where Google Play Music is available at https://support.google.com/googleplay/?p=availability

Learn more about Google Play Music at https://play.google.com/music

comments: I've used this app for years now and never saw a reason to bother with another one. But now I need to switch to another option. I use music on my phone to deal with sensory issues. Unfortunately, Google has decided to start sneaking Tracks It Thinks I Might Like (I think) on my playlists every here and there. At first, I could delete them and found an option to tell it to stop downloading them. But now, it streams them instead, and I can't just get rid of them with the 'delete' button anymore. This is extremely disrupting and, in areas of higher stress/sensory input, downright distressing. I need to switch to another music player because and only because I can't find an "off setting" for its new "add random music you don't own to your Playing Now" habit. If they decide to fix this and I find out that they fixed it, I really wouldn't mind going back to it. But for now, it's a no-go for me.

Has a lot of problems really. It crashes, it always restarts the songs everytime I play them. I can't find most of the artists I listen. I mean Bethel Music is a really popular group but they don't have most of their content. Scrolling problem, not enough distance between the 3 dots and the scroll line. I'm really dissatisfied. Please fix it.

Can you please fix the scroll problem? There is very little space between the scroll bar and the three dots symbol for each song. This is incredibly frustrating when you are trying to add multiple songs to a playlist. If you tap a couple of millimeters to the right, the scroll button gets activated and takes you to a random portion of the song list. I can't believe Google hasn't fixed this yet.

Weird beeping has started to play every time a button is pressed or the song auto plays to the next in a play list SO ANNOYING, can't seem to find a fix for this. It is random, sometimes it's there and other times it doesn't do it. Have sent feedback from the app but that goes no where. I'm going to download all my songs and use the dafault Samsung music app.

Best music player before I began to use a samsung. Even now, play music is yet one of the top music apps; if not among the top 3. However, we can add the search feature to the app, so one could search, stream and download any music. This would perfect play music and increase the rate of downloads. Already, it's been from Google LLC, but adding the feature suggested would make this app top 3. Another feature we can add is the dark mode. Thanks and well done Google LLC. Nick, Nigeria.

I just searched MP3 player randomly and found it, read some of the reviews and downloaded it directly. When I opened it a bit, I quickly liked it. After I looked at all of the menus, I loved it. After I played some songs, I quickly wrote this review.

title: FX Player - video player, cast, chromecast, stream
description:
FX Player is the video player you are looking for.
It is equipped with a mobile-optimized interface and offers perfect play in both local and network streaming environment.
Plus, its videos along with subtitles can be sent to TV through Chromecast. 
I can assure you that FX Player is the ideal video player all of you have been dreaming of.

	
■ KEY FEATURES
□ All video formats, MKV, MP4, M4V, AVI, ASF, MOV, 3GP, FLV, MPG, MOV, OGV, H.264, MPEG4, DIVX, XVID, WMV, RM, TS etc
□ All audio formats, MP3, MIDI, APE, WAV, FLAC, AC3, AAC, APE, WMA, ACC PLUS and external codec etc
□ All subtitles, SMI(SAMI), SRT, SSA, VTT, ASS, IDX, SUB, MKV(Embedded) etc
□ HD, Full HD, 1080p, 4K, dvd, blu-ray ripping video etc
□ Cast videos to TV with Chromecast (supported subtitles, srt, smi. vtt etc)
□ Built-in Network client, FTP, SMB, CIFS, HTTP or WebDAV
□ Fast forward ,fast backward with Double Tap gestures
□ Manage and edit video files such as rename, delete, move
□ Easy gesture control of brightness and volume, playback, resize, speed
□ Six video playback functions, Auto, Shuffle, Repeat, Background, Mirror Mode - flip video to learn dance, Video playback resume from last position
□ Fast scanning all video files on your device and SD Card automatically
□ Floating Video(pop-up player), Watching your video while browsing the web
□ Keep & Move your video safe with private folder
□ Hardware acceleration
□ Supports Multilingual Audio
	
   
[ SUGGESTION / QUESTIONS ] 
□ FX Player was produced by our own engine and technology from the beginning, so we can quickly realize functions that you want.
Please leave your opinions anytime in FIPE forum.
□ FIPE Forum : http://www.fipe.tv/forum


Permissions:
FX Player needs permission on the following categories

READ EXTERNAL STORAGE (mandatory)
- is required in order to read your file on sdcard

WRIET_EXTERNAL STORAGE (mandatory)
- is requried in order to modify your files for renaming or deleting
- is required in order to be secure your files for secret mode

DRAW On OTHER APP (optional)
- is required in order to run pop-up (pip) player

comments: The selection of files in a samba folder only works until a certain amount of files. Tested it by moving the files from one folder to another. If the folder contains say more than 25 to 26 files, it shows No files.... What's creepy: If you try to send a message on the homepage, you get a server error 500. They don't want your response. Immediately removed from my systems...

This is the best video player but lacks some basic features such as 1. Search option to search for media in local folders(it is essential) 2. Background playback, 3. Folder sorting in two major divisions(internal and external storage) and then under them their subfolders. Please make these improvements.

The ability to show subtitles on Chromecast looks promising, but how do I download subtitles with this App? VLC, MX player and others have easy ways of downloading subtitles, but they cannot cast the subtitles. This App claims it can cast subtitles but has no ability to download subtitles? How odd!
It works great, no issues. I like that I can be on video call and watch videos at the same time

Perfect video player, it. The attributes are just a amazing. For example, While watching a video, you could actually view the list of videos you have already watched, without going off from the current video... Also, you can hide personal videos in a secret folder. In addition to this, the video quality, as well as sound quality is commendable as well. Really cool app .

MX Player, the most powerful mobile video player now brings you an Android TV streaming service offering thousands of hours of premium, exclusive and original content from leading producers and publishers. It’s a one-stop app for some of the best Movies, TV Shows & Web Series. The platform lays focus on exclusive original content with an emphasis on high-quality Hindi and regional languages. title: Nova Video Player
description:
Nova is an opeN sOurce Video plAyer designed for tablets, phones and AndroidTV devices.available at https://github.com/nova-video-player/aos-AVP

Universal player:  
- Play videos from your computer, server (FTP, SFTP), NAS (SMB, UPnP)
- Play videos from external USB storage 
- Videos from all sources integrated in a unified multimedia collection
- Automatic online retrieval of movie and TV show descriptions with posters and backdrops
- Integrated subtitle download

Best player:
- Hardware accelerated video decoding for most devices and video formats
- Multi-audio tracks and mutli-subtitles support
- Supported file formats: MKV, MP4, AVI, WMV, FLV, etc.
- Supported subtitle file types: SRT, SUB, ASS, SMI, etc.

TV friendly:
- Dedicated “leanback” user interface for Android TV
- AC3/DTS passthrough (HDMI or S/PDIF) on supported hardware: Nexus Player, NVidia SHIELD TV, Rockchip and AmLogic based TV-boxes
- 3D support with side-by-side and top-bottom formats playback for 3D TVs
- Audio Boost mode to increase the volume level
- Night Mode to dynamically adjust the volume level

Browse the way you want:
- Instant access to recently added and recently played videos
- Browse movies by name, genre, year, duration, rating
- Browse TV shows by seasons
- Folder browsing supported

And even more: 
- Multi-device network video resume
- NFO metadata processing for descriptions and posters
- Scheduled rescan of your network content (Leanback UI only)
- Private mode: temporarily disable playback history recording
- Manually adjust subtitles synchronization
- Manually adjust audio/video synchronization
- Track what your collection and what you have watched via Trakt

In case you have an issue or a request about this app, please check our Reddit support community at this address: https://www.reddit.com/r/NovaVideoPlayer

If you experience any issue with video hardware decoding you can force software decoding in the application preferences.

You are welcome to contribute to the translation of the application at https://crowdin.com/project/nova-video-player

NOVA stands for opeN sOurce Video plAyer.

comments: Absolutely brilliant!! I started using Nova Player as Archos stopped working on my Nvidia Shield TV. It's so easy to use and you have the ability to change the poster art and thumbnails. I have it connected to my Western Digital PR2100 and it has scraped all my movies. The 'use other player' option is good, as I use Kodi in conjunction with it and I'm very pleased with the playback quality. It also has regular updates too, so I highly recommend this app.

Actually surprised by how good this app is on my Nvidia shield. Not a big fan of Kodi so a media player that scrapes titles for tv and movies is a big plus. Like the ability to download subtitles quickly as well. One minor negative is that there's only one other aspect ratio on the app and it distorts when in full screen because of the A.I upscaling feature on the shield. Not the only app that has this problem. Still, it's an excellent app that should be the default on the shield. Two Thumbs up!

Seems to be working for Android TV 9. I see an option for playlists, but I don't see how to make one for the videos I keep on an external USB drive. The only options I see are sync with trakt account which I don't have or want or a rather cryptic note to create it by adding new items from video info. No idea what is meant by that, can't find how to do that.

This is a great app which offers customization options. It has a great interface though I prefer a dark gray or black background instead of blue. Also, I am doing zooper widget templates and it would be best if the app has shortcuts which i can use in zooper. For instance when i click a specific widget icon it will directly go to the specific playlist or video. It has no shortcuts which I think will be a great addition to this app.

This video player is absolutely phenomenal.I haven't yet tried regretting going premium with this app. One thing, every update just make the app more delightful using it . One suggestion though, can you make the background dynamic?. Where the backdrop changes colour as to what you currently selecting on screen. That would make your app even more complete

title: Video Player for Android
description:
Video Player for Android, the easiest video player in the market.
Video Player for Android is currently the easiest-to-use video player on the market. Its intelligent detection adaptive algorithm makes it more convenient for you to enjoy smoother, better quality videos. 
It supports all popular video formats, including AVI, 3GP, M4V, MOV, MP4, WMV, RMVB, MKV, TS, MPG, FLV, etc. It uses hardware decoding, which make video play smoother. It can automatically detect videos in the phone memory and SD Card, allowing you to quickly locate and play the video.
As a media player, Video Player for Android can not only play high-definition videos, movies and flash files, but also play music. So Video Player for Android can be used as a music player as well.

Video Player for Android is the essential software of android mobile phone. It is definitely your best partner when enjoying the movie!

Features:
1 automatic identifiy all mobile phone video files
2 supports all video and audio playback formats
3 supports multiple subtitle formats, automatic synchronization
4 using hardware decoding, take advantage of hardware acceleration
5 small memory, simple operation, quick start, smooth playback support

Enjoy it!

title: BSPlayer
description:
BSPlayer FREE is top hardware accelerated video player for Android smartphones and tablet PCs.

Main features:
- multi-core (dual and quad-core) HW decoding support - significantly improves playback speed
- background playback in popup window (long tap on button Back to playback video and audio in popup video)
- hardware accelerated video playback - increases speed and reduces battery consumption*
- Multiple audio streams and subtitles.
- Playlist support and various playback modes.
- External and embedded subtitles ssa/ass, srt, sub. txt...
- Find subtitles automatically (mobile data or wi-fi must be enabled to work)
- Playback media files such as videos and mp3's directly via Wi-Fi from your network shared drives/folders (such as external USB drives, Samba (SMB/CIFS) shared drives, PC shared folders, NAS servers (Synology and others)) - no need to convert video files and copy media files to SD card anymore! 
- Playback files directly from uncompressed RAR files
- Lock screen to prevent accidental change of videos (children lock)
- support for USB OTG (On-The-Go) for example: Nexus media importer, USB OTG Helper, USB Host Controller... and much more!

This package includes support for ARMv7 with VFP and NEON. For other CPU types please download appropriate package. Application will notify you which package you need.

BSPlayer FREE version is ad-supported video player. BSPlayer full version without advertisements with added functionality is available on Google Play.

NOTE: When reporting error please add info about your smartphone brand and model. Also you can send us more detailed bug report on e-mail android@bsplayer.com. We are trying to improve the player for the users and your feedback is appreciated.

This software uses code of FFmpeg licensed under the LGPLv2.1 and its source can be downloaded from BSPlayer website.

Dedicated forum can be found here: http://forum.bsplayer.com/bsplayer-android/.

*Hardware acceleration support depends on device video decoder capability. Hardware accelerated playback in portrait mode may be corrupted on some HTC models (HD and others - hardware issue). Also on some devices (Samsung galaxy S2) zoom/stretch may not work on all video types.

Translations and corrections of the translations can now be submitted here: http://crowdin.net/project/bsplayer-android!

Don't forget to vote 5 stars if you like it and if you don't - let us know why! :) 

Screenshots taken from following movies under Creative Commons license:
Sintel - © copyright Blender Foundation | durian.blender.org
Tears of Steel - (CC) Blender Foundation | mango.blender.org

comments: I would give 5 but recently it started playing different songs than what it said. I figured it was my phone so I tested it when I later got a new one (for different reasons) and the same thing happens. It says x song but I'm hearing y song. It wouldn't be a problem if it was just when I'm scuffling ALL of my songs but it happens when I'm listening to one of my playlists. Itll play songs that aren't even on the playlist. Please fix this, its very frustrating

A great app for playing your music. The interface is costumizable and many skin options to choose from. You can edit song tags, playlist and add album covers. The colors match the album cover which is a nice visual. The free version has pop up ads and the EQ is not that perfect, but overall is way better than Google Play. Highly recommend.

I find this to be a great music player. I wanted a music player that would recognize folders because of how I sort my music . The previous app I was using developed a bug that would automatically play the last song from my phone when I got in my car weather her I called it up or not. I still really like this music player, but I don't like the adds that interrupt everything. I decided to spend the 6.99 ONE-TIME purchase to remove adds. My subscription went through as .99/monthly. This is the choice that I didn't want. I don't know how to change this. They just forced me into the more expensive plan. NOT COOL!

This is the best media player I've used by far. No gripes whatsoever, keep up the good work! Edit: VERY unfortunate that I have to re-rate this app so low... It seems they started focusing more on full screen, spammy ads than the actual experience of the user. It lags horribly now and will even completely hang up mid-song forcing you to restart your phone before it will play again (that or do a hard restart of the app which is a long process when you have the widget install on your homepage).

This is a fantastic music player . . . when you buy it. The ads are super-intrusive if you don't. Have fun waiting five seconds for the playable ads to disappear every single time you want to switch songs. Docked it a point for that. Still rated it a four though because what is there is great. Making playlists and editing tags are easy to do and you can customize how it looks using either the basic colors the app offers or even using pictures from your phone. It's a good.

title: Onkyo HF Player
description:
Get greater control of how music sounds on your Android device with our touch-adjustable linear-phase FIR equalizer, which offers 16,384 discrete bands of HD equalization with zero loss in audio quality. Create and save your own EQ presets or select an optimized filter created by professional musicians. HF Player for Android also enables playback of Hi-Res Audio formats including FLAC, 192 kHz/24-bit WAV, and DSD at no extra charge.

Digital Output
Enjoy stunning audio quality anywhere you like by adding an Onkyo DAC-HA200 or DAC-HA300, Pioneer XPA-700 D/A Converter and Headphone Amplifier to enable a direct-digital connection to your AOA 2.0 (Android Open Accessory)-compatible Android device via USB cable. OTG (On The Go) cables facilitate a digital connection to USB audio-compatible external devices—simply purchase our Unlock Application and update to the full-featured version of Onkyo HF Player for Android to enable Hi-Res Audio output.
Note: Audio with a sampling rate exceeding 88.2 kHz output via the headphone connection, AOS connection, digital connections via OTG cable (free version only) is downsampled to 44.1 kHz.

Features 
• Updated user interface
• Music lyrics supported by petit lyrics
• High-precision equalizer (16,384 discrete bands, linear-phase FIR filter)
• Automatic upsampling function
• Crossfade playback option
• Album artwork and song lyric display
• Repeat function (songs within a list)
• Resume Playback Function
• Shuffle function (within a list)
• Tab based sorting, such as Artist name, Album name, Playlist, etc. Tab order can be arranged in settings
• Folder based playback
• Scrobble with Last.fm
• Selectable equalizer presets optimized by musicians for Onkyo headphones
• Easily add songs to playlists and Up Next list
• Playlist creation and editing
• Real-time DSD conversion function (supported on paid version)
• Volume control function for USB-audio-compatible external hardware using volume keys of Android devices 
• Link into OnkyoMusic(where available) and download purchased music directly
• Replay Gain (supported on paid version)
• Real-time volume normalizer (supported on paid version)

Supported Formats
• MP3, ALAC (up to 48 kHz)
• DSF/DSD-IFF [DSD(2.8 MHz) / Double-rate DSD(5.6 MHz) / Quad-rate DSD(11.2 MHz), DoP / PCM conversion
• FLAC, ALAC, WAV, AIFF(up to 384 kHz), Ogg-Vorbis (up to 192 kHz)
Note: Audio with a sampling rate exceeding 88.2 kHz is downsampled to 44.1 kHz or 48 kHz.

Languages 
English, French, German, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese 

Requirements
Requires Android 4.1 or later.
* Operation of this application is not guaranteed for all devices.

comments: The app delivers an absolute brilliant sound quality! I use it in combination with an external USB DAC and compared to other music players the equalizer and gapless playback works flawless. What I really would like to have it's that once you listen to a song and step back to the albums/artists there is no way to switch back to the currently playing track unless you're back at the home screen. Also it would be nice to use the app in landscape mode.

Best audio player in terms of playback quality. I enjoy it so much I paid to unlocked all features. If you have a OnePlus 3 like me, using this app you can play to usb earphones/devices if you go into settings and enable OTG. Why did I reserve one star? 1) It lacks playback for FTP server. 2) even after buying the hf activate key, sometimes the player won't recognize the key

This player sounds good and sweet.. I don't think this process bit perfect. The sweetness must be coming from the signal processing. Important thing that I think really need to be added is the capability to read and play CUE file. Oh.. If it could play DSD ISO and .ape files, those are good bonus too..
It's good but not great. Sometimes it won't find my new music that is added. It never backs up playlist properly, and they need to add a sleep timer.

Amazing, it drives my Xduoo link on my Note 10+ I can play my files on DSD direct transfer without a problem, the only wish is the custom EQ shall be modified by values instead of a finger, it moves the frequencies.

comments: Decent app, though there is a bug with the left/right audio switch that when you adjust it too much, the music will bug out and not play. Only fixed with a hard reset. Other than that, if we can either get new themes or personalize our own, I'd be ecstatic. - (added) seems to be another bug where it randomly turns on Shuffle when I just want to go through my albums normally. Could you get rid of that blue shuffle button on the album page?

I am uninstalling this App because the Tala advert cannot allow me to operate a it .I made a mistake of installing this App again. Unfortunately it could not allow me to play even the first song as it kept on blocking me with ads.
Best I've ever had... second to none. Just the fact that that am able to select my lovely blue interface colour services my soul. And not forgetting the sound feel... man I love it... 5 For you...
Why does so many ads keep popping up its really annoying how can i fix this? The app is good i love it but can i remove the ads?

Some great features as a music player. Sharing, ONLY on my Gmail. (**Doesn't offer sharing via Hangouts ... And, when tapping to share on Messaging, it takes you there, but with NO mp3 in tow.) You can EDIT. **But, whilst you can cut the length of an mp3, there's sadly NO Fade-In/Fade-Out.😒 (ONLY BETWEEN SONGS, as BASIC music player.) WOULD'VE been my all-in-one music app, otherwise. Now, have to keep searching for THAT GEM.🤔 (Used to have, but lost it when I changed phones.) Many, many ADS. -

title: Samsung Music
description:
Samsung Music is optimized for Samsung android device and provides a powerful music play functionality and the best user interface.

Key Features

1. Supports playback of various sound formats such as MP3, WMA, AAC, FLAC.
2. Helps to effectively manage song lists by categories.(Track,Album,Artist,Genre,Folder,Composer)
3. Supports a new user experience that easily interact with Samsung smart devices like Tablet,TV(DLNA,Screen mirroring),Wearable.
4. Provides a clean and intuitive user interface.
5. The Samsung music shows recommendation of playlists from Spotify. You can find Spotify recommendation music by Spotify tab and search Spotify music you’ll love.
(The Spotify tab is only available in countries where Spotify is on service.)

What is FLAC?
FLAC is an audio coding format similar to MP3 & AAC, but lossless, meaning that audio is compressed in FLAC without any loss in quality.


*** Required App Permissions ***
Below mandatory permission is required for basic features of Samsung Music.
Even if optional permission are denied, basic features may work properly.

[Mandatory Permission]
1. STORAGE permission :
   - Allows the player to write,modify,delete to SD card.
   - Allows the player to read data from SD card.

[Optional Permission]
2. MICROPHONE permission : Galaxy S4, Note3, Note4 only
   - Allows to control the player with voice commands which are listening, not recording.
     ex : PLAY,PAUSE,NEXT,PREVIOUS,VOLUME UP,VOLUME DOWN

3. PHONE permission : Korean devices only.
   - Verify your phone when using the music service.

recentChanges:
[16.2.21.6]
Fixed list

- Next song is not played in some models

comments: The app is good but there is a huge problem, recently added songs to my device is not recognized by the app, hence is super annoying and no matter what matter I do, the problem is not corrected. This problem occurred in the recent update, never had this issue before, would give a 4 or 5 stars if not for this problem. The recently added songs are on my device(SAMSUNG A30) but is not recognized by the app itself, PLEASE FIX.

What is it that I have to do to be able to click on the first song in an album, and then have it play the whole album in the right order? What is the arrows circling with an A in the center icon for? It only shuffles the currently playing album, whether I have shuffle on or not. This app didn't used to do that, so what happened? You consider "Next song is not played in some models" (in [16.2.21.6] fixes) to be an improvement? It seems like all kinds of weird random stuff is not working properly with this app, going off the other reviews. What happened to the quality we used to get with Samsung?

Not good, the music suddenly just stops. I had a Samsung galaxy S5 and the music would play for a while then just stop, so I had to press the play button again, it happened very often, I assumed it was because I had an older model, I've just upgraded to a Samsung Galaxy S10, I've downloaded this app and it does the same thing again, plays for 5 mins and then just stops, please tell me why Samsung?

Up until yesterday, I've loved the seamless way Samsung Music manages music, especially playlists . However, after the most recent Android system upgrade, my playlists have been stripped of all their tracks.  The songs are still there, visible on my SD card,  but the most important part of the equation (the playlists) have disappeared. When will this problem be fixed? I'd be happy to give this app 5 stars once it resolves this issue

Good app, nice UI interface for on-phone music but inflexible when it comes to selecting which music to include in your collection. It will select all music file types on your phone (including call recordings, ringtones, etc) and include them in your library with no capability of excluding tracks/folders. it's all or nothing. It's a shame since otherwise this is a very good interface for playing music. It will also link to Spotify (but you can't log into it) but no other streaming services.

title: Eon Music Player
description:
Eon Music Player is a minimal, feature packed, highly customizable and one of the cleanest Material Design Music Player. 

Home Screen: 
Option to customize home screen which by default includes following sections:
Tracks, Albums, Artists, Playlists, Genre and Folder view. 
You have the option to remove any page you want from home screen or change the order in which they appear. 

Easy navigation & Quick controls: 
Eon Music Player gives you easy to use navigation, quick controls and nicely formatted drop down menus. You don't have to wander around in complex menus to find anything, everything is right where you need/expect it to be. There is no clutter and there are hardly any hidden or complex menus which make it one of the cleanest Material Design Music Player. 

Folder View: 
Eon Music Player gives you access to all your audio files with a list of all folders which contain audio files. You can also switch to Hierarchical folder view after upgrading to Eon Music Player Pro. 

Themes: 
Eon Music Player gives you 4 preset themes (Light, Dark, Black and Transparent) to customize Eon Music Player to make it your own the way you like it. Eon Music Player Pro upgrade also includes many more theme presets and a built-in Theme Maker which allows to create as many themes as you want. 

Player Screen Themes: 
With Eon Music Player you have the option to customize Player screen, two Player skins (themes) provided in free version and three more options with Eon Music Player Pro upgrade. 

Standard Features: 
• Eon Music Player supports all common formats like mp3 - aac - ogg - wav - m4a - flac 
• Clean and clutter free Material Design Music Player. 
• Equalizer
• Folder filters 
• Unified search.
• Tag Edit.
• Homescreen widget in 12 sizes. 
• Notification/Lock screen controls. 
• Create, edit and listen to playlists. 
• Auto Download missing album arts in high quality. 
• Customize home screen. 
• Quick navigation. 
• Eon Music Player supports Android JellyBean to Android Pie. 
#AudioPlayer, #MP3Player, #Offline Music Player 

Coming soon: 
Tablet support. 
More Languages. 


Permissions Explained: 
Eon Music Player needs following
permissions: 


To read audio files. 
android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE 


To save downloaded album arts for later use. 
android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE 


To Download album arts.
android.permission.INTERNET 


To keep on playing when device is in sleep mode.
android.permission.WAKE_LOCK 


To set a clip as Ring Tone. 
android.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS 


To check if there's is any type of data
connection before attempting to download album arts. 
android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE 
android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE 

If you have any issue regarding Eon Music Player Pro upgrade or anything payment related please drop us an email and we'll get back to you as soon as possible. Also if something does not work please report it using Eon Music Player contact menu, you can also request new features through 'Feature Request'. 

If you want to help in translating Eon Music Player to your native language get in touch using Eon Music Player settings 'Contact > Contribute Translation'. You will get credit for your help in the Eon Music Player's 'About' section. 

Note 
Please note that:
• Eon Music Player does NOT let you download Music, nor do we encourage illegal Music downloads. 
• Eon Music Player does NOT let you stream Music. 
• Eon Music Player is a local Music Player/Music Library Manager. 

Looking forward to your feedback, hope you enjoy using Eon Music Player.

comments: This is a beautiful app. Sends music, plays via folder, has nice themes etc. I only have two problems with it for now: 1. The search function Instead of giving me the results of the song or artist that I am searching for, it gives me all the songs and then at the bottom of all my songs it gives me the results. I think that's a bug. Please fix this. 2. The widgets When I add it's widgets they don't show the play/pause, prev and next buttons. Please fix this too. Thanks, Regards Ludwe

Great music player if you've sorted all your music files into folders. UI is clean, Themes are custom and able to be changed. Home menu can be easily customized to reduce clutter. Screen off mode can help save battery when you play music and leave the screen off. Pro mode is completely optional, and you don't have to get rid of any ads--because there are none I've ever bumped into.

Great app, looks stunning with plenty customization options and, unlike some other music players I've tried, doesn't change the album track order. My only gripe is that, when you disabled automatic download of the album covers, the album section doesn't display any covers even if all the tracks from that album have an album cover. Singular tracks still display the cover. It's somewhat of a minor gripe. The rest od the app is awesome.

Installed it today, but it looks pretty good so I'll give 5 stars for now. There's an issue and a suggestion tho. The issue is that I can't download artwork, it says that it failed. The suggestion is that the albums should be ordered by year, not alphabetically.

So far; So good! All other music players I downloaded would play music with an echo - ish playback sound and it was very frustrating to listen to. This music player tho does not have that echo - ish sound. Keep up the good work. If I can think of any suggestions on how to make the app better, I will submit my feedback, Developers!

title: Video Player All Format for Android
description:

title: Dub Music Player - MP3 Player, Music equalizer 🎧
description:
Become One of the 40 Million users who installed and rated 4.7 stars this unrepeatable MP3 player. 
With perfect interface for mobile phones, style of classic player, stuning skins and very usable UI, you can play your favorite songs and make new playlists while you enjoy watching how equilazer bars moves in the rithm of the music or play with vinyl records turntable like proffesional DJ.
You can easily compose new playlists and add new tracks to play music and mix songs as you like.
Use 9 professional equalizer presets to make it your Android sounds like never before!
Play songs & listen to good music with Dub Music Player now! Get stereo quality sounds with our audio enhancer features such as eq and bass booster. 

Features:

☆ Crossfade and Crossfader
Use these awesome features to mix mp3 files to enjoy in gapless playback and mix songs like professional DJ.

☆ Audio Enhancers
Adjust your music volume with a five-band music equalizer and 9 professional music genres presets for your choice. The presets include Hip-hop, Rock, Dance, Pop, Latin, Metal, Classical, etc. This enhancer will boost your sound like an amplifier. Bass boost will boost your bass and Virtualizer makes your sound virtual. These features enable high quality audio reproduction.

Our player supports most popular formats such as MP3, WAV, AAC, FLAC, 3GP, OGG, MIDI, etc.

You will be amazed by our sound spectrum graphic equalizer bars, analog VU meter, circular soundbars, and vinyl records turntable. All the music spectrums bars move according to the audio rhythm when our app play songs of your choice.

Listen to your downloaded songs in your music library easily. There is no need to waste data charge just to listen to good music.

✔ Create and edit playlist

comments: Press and HOLD the and buttons to get it to rewind or fast-forward through the song at intervals of approx. 10 seconds for each 1 second you HOLD the button down. Lots of useful effects & features in this app. But when I attempt to remove the ads (I'm even willing to pay to pay the $4 fee to upgrade)...I get a "server connection issue" error message. It seems that I'm stuck with the ads...seems that they don't want my money! So, only 4 stars now. Fix this for the full 5 stars! Problem fixed!

I'm an old user of this app. Since 2016! Whenever I change my phone I always remember to download this app. I always wish to have a better version of this app. But recently I'm using a Samsung phone and I'm having some issues like it's automatically disable the bass whenever I change the volume. Now I have to hear the entire song with same volume to continue bass mode on or hear the song with bass by continously turn it (Bass) on whenever I change the volume. So what should I do now? Help me!

Tried lots of music apps. This is one of my favourites . Most other app are a variation of the same thing, this has a different layout, the colour and look can be customized by the user. Variable crossfade, graphic equaliser and a nice big volume control knob which a lot don't have. Displays Album art, track and artist info NO INTRUSIVE ADDS.

Decent app...but a few significant probs for me. When on the playing track screen and I navigate to library, it doesn't start at the artist or album I'm currently listening to; it defaults to the top of whatever is in my library. Also the track being played doesn't interface correctly through bluetooth to my vehicle screen via "Ford Pass App" connectivity.

I have had this app for as long as I can remember, and I'm sorry to say that I may be removing it. The app plays music quieter than the mp3 file is even when the volume is at max and the extra volume control is at max. I had this at a five star rating before I ran into this glitch.

title: Music Folder Player Free
description:
Music Folder Player was made for people who don't like to see music displayed based on artist, album, track or playlists. If you prefer organizing your audio tracks in folder this may be the right player for you.

Besides that it comes with a lot of unique features.

• Material Design
• Resume where you left. Stores for each folder where you left
• Show folders as a 'flat' list if you have a small collection
• Show folder hierarchy like in a file manager for larger collections
• Virtual folder with your favorite songs
• Playlists
• Four configurable seek buttons. Very useful for seeking in podcasts or audio books
• Equalizer:
  - 4 customizable settings
  - 8 predefined settings like Bass Booster, Vocal Booster and Party setting
• Virtual room and reverb effect
• Speed control with pitch correction (OS 4.2+)
  Increase or decrease the playback speed of your podcasts or audio books.
  Speed control is not suitable for music. Please watch the video: http://youtu.be/d_0eWUXs6Yo
• Pre-amplifyer: Increase the volume of audio which was recorded with a low level. (OS 4.2+)
• 432 Hz playback mode. Please read this article for details: http://goo.gl/Oeg5hh (OS 4.2+)
• Car/Sports mode with big buttons
• Change volume and balance with two finger gesture. Video: http://goo.gl/9LXsIE
• Undo function: Undo actions if you accidentally touch a button or select another track
• Shuffle and repeat options (long tap on play/pause button)
• Delete and rename files (long tap on file)
• Sleep timer
• Headset button control (double and triple clicks)
• Search for files and folder
• Share files

Note: Since there are recently some complaints in the review section:
This app is an audio PLAYER, not a DOWNLOADER. If you search for an app to download new music, this app is NOT suitable for you. This player just handles audio files which are already on your device.

Don't worry about 'adware' warnings of some antivirus scanners. Of course the player is not a virus. This is just because the player shows advertisements. The full version is not affected by that.

Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Zorillasoft

Permissions: Please take a look at the F.A.Q section on my homepage:
http://www.zorillasoft.de/MusicFolderPlayer-jp.html#faq

v2.5.8
* Implemented feature to add home screen shortcuts for folders. Long tap on a folder and select \'Add shortcut to home screen\'. This requires a new permission.
