comments: Disclaimer: I love this app. I've been using it for 2 years and have had amazing experiences. Some things I think this app could possibly work on: 1. Sometimes after I've added a song to a playlist or my favorites, then I rename it, the song disappears from these places and it's only shown in its origin folder. 2. This is just a suggestion but I would love to be able to add a song to queue, and to be able to see the queue somewhere (maybe somewhere in the now playing screen).

I was expecting this app as scam, but when i tried it, i dont have flexible (programmable) folder player better than this APP. How i wish you add A-B reapeat, then i will stop using any music player app. Thank you very much, but please let the app be free forever :)

This is everything I wanted in a player. I needed a player that would not go to sleep, would play all of the files in my my folders in sequence and would play all of my folders in sequence and their files on sequence. This is very important for listening to audio books. The player remembers where it left off on the previous play session. I love it!

An excellent free sound file player. The adverts are not obtrusive. It allows you to group music files in to play-lists. I like that it remembers where you were, in playing a music file, when you close it down, and that it continues playing, when you put it in the back-ground. The controls are bold and easy-to-use. A highly recommended app.

There's apparently no way to do something as simple as deleting a playlist, even when the audio source files have been deleted. (Edit: The developer responded telling me to do something I tried many times, so I'm gonna assume it's just my old phone and change my rating to 4 stars. I appreciate devs taking the time.) (2nd edit: Been using the app for a long time now and whatever bugs may have been there have been worked out and the app functions great! 5★)

title: PlayerXtreme Media Player - Movies & streaming
description:
PlayerXtreme Media Player the most popular cross-platform Audio Player, Video Player, Movie Player and Online Streaming Player now available on Google Play Store. With this Free Media Player you can watch videos, movies, listen to music and more, in any format, with mesmerizing audio and video results on the go from anywhere, even if they don’t normally play or even sync with your Phone or Tablet! Download PlayerXtreme Media Player & start transferring & watching your favorite movies with perfect HD video playback without conversion!

PlayerXtreme Media Player is able to run files in almost any video format.  It has the following formats covered:

Formats Supported:
3gp, asf, avi, divx, dv, dat, flv, gxf, m2p, m2ts, m2v, m4v, mkv, moov, mov, mp4, mpeg, mpeg1, mpeg2, mpeg4, mpg, mpv, mt2s, ts, mts, mxf, ogm, ogv, ps, qt, rm, rmvb, ts, vob, webm, wm, wmv.

Features:
•	Direct Play without conversion: Play all your media files without conversion and enjoy direct playback with this free media player.
•	Any Format: The all format video player supports all file types including hi-fi music and video formats. MKV, MP4, AVI, WMV, MOV and 40+ formats are supported.
•	Subtitles on Steroids: The incredible movie player supports all popular formats of subtitles. It allows Closed Captioned (CC), SRT, SMI, TXT and more to play all your media with subtitles.
•	Hardware Accelerated Plus: Playback powered by 6th Gen Hardware Accelerated Core produces vibrant video and sharper sound unmatched.  Enjoy perfect audio and video quality while watching your media in PlayerXtreme.
•	4k Ultra HD Playback Support: PlayerXtreme is able to deliver smooth 4k HD 1080p MKV playback which makes it a perfect movie player.
•	Streaming: Stream directly from your PC, NAS drive or Websites. Support for both audio streaming and video streaming.
•	Files and Folders: You don’t need to learn the app. It is almost like using your home computer. 
•	Available Anywhere: Stream all of your media to all your devices, anytime, anywhere, with the same beautiful experience on all of them.
•	No Storage Limit: Play, watch and stream as much as you have on your server or storage device, in this free media player without sacrificing quality, security, or performance.
•	All in one: Unlike conventional video players , PlayerXtreme gives you all features in one brilliant app.
•	Multi-language support: Support for files with multiple audio languages and tracks to watch videos in your preferred language.
•	Multi-track support: Support for files with multiple audio languages and tracks.
•	Repeat & Shuffle: Repeat and shuffle audio and video tracks to watch videos on repeat	
•	Screen rotation: Lock or unlock screen rotation with one tap.
•	Video aspect ratio: Change the aspect ratio from the video player
•	Audio delay: Change the audio, video syncing while streaming or playing your media 
•	Subtitle delay: Change the subtitle syncing with audio/video by using subtitle delay.  	
•	Resize subtitle text: Change subtitle text based on your need. 
•	Background mode: Tracks keep on playing while device is on standby. 
•	Gesture control: With scroll you can turn the volume up and down or you can your track forward or backward in the video player. Custom actions can be set on these gestures.
•	Library Organization: Organize all of your media; videos, movies, photos, and music in beautiful poster view format.	
•	Jump ten seconds forward or backward, Frame by frame option, gesture control, change playback speed, resize subtitles text.

Reach out to us, share your experiences and stay up to date with the upcoming news and latest updates of PlayerXtreme, the best media player for Android!
•	Facebook: Enjoy the app? Give us a like! 	
https://www.facebook.com/PlayerXtreme/
•	Twitter: Follow PlayerXtreme!
https://twitter.com/playerxtreme

title: Casse-o-player
description:
Do you like the charm of old analog cassette tapes? Use Casse-o-player - cassette deck in your phone! All you need from audio player, plus a library of the most legendary and stylish cassette tapes from the first in market in 1960th to the top-level chrome and metal tapes from 1990th. All the cassette tapes are fully animated and recreated with great care in details.

With this player, you will receive:
• accurate models of 63 classic compact cassettes from 1960-2000
• showing cassette in a compact or full-screen mode
• 4 skins: beige, aluminium, black brushed metal and carbon
• realistic animation of reels and tape
• rewind the tape in cassette deck style with sound effect (press and hold Back/Next buttons)
• level meters and LED-indicators like in the vintage reel recorders and cassette decks
• volume control in analog style

Also you will receive standard audio-player functions:
• creating a playlist from the list of songs, albums, artists and folders
• managing playlists
• re-sizable widget 3х1 (can be re-sized to 4х1, 5х1)
• playback control buttons in Android notification area (for Android 4.1 and higher)
• playback control using headset buttons (single, double, triple-click)
• auto-pause when headphones are unplugged
• auto-updatable songs library 
• play music in the background

Please note: Application needs permission to RECORD AUDIO. This is sure to render the volume levels. The application doesn’t record user conversations, as well as in any other way doesn’t spy on the user.

comments: This is a pretty cool app, the visualisations for the cassettes and vumeters are awesome. There are, however, a few things I would like to see in future updates. 1. Album Artist - I would like the ability to sort my music collection by Album Artist in addition to or instead of simply Artist. 2. Gapless playback. 3. Folder hierarchy - All the folders are lumped into one big long list. Annoying if you sort by Genre/Album Artist/Year-Album as I do. 4. Ad-removal - the option to pay to remove ads.

ONLY 1 FLAW! Pay to remove the adds please. I LOVE the player it's easy to use and the most important thing is you can build PLAYLIST very easily. I am not a streaming music person and I own my music so I want A music player to at least let you easily make playlists and this one does it. Love the retro cassette players and cassette selection. Reminds me of the days I had made my own cassette mixes. I would give it 5 if you can remove the annoying add at the top by paying a few bucks.

Excellent, really love this player. I also love actual cassette players and own a few. Great app for plugging into the amp at home and playing you faves while relaxing watching it play, and also great for surprising people down the pub when you show them it playing.😄💖
This is a very beautiful dependable app in the entire Google play store. It gives you what you want anytime you want. First class app of no equal and comparison in all ramifications. Good work.
This is an excellent free audio player with the best visualisation you are likely to find. If it supported gapless playback it would be perfect

comments: Good. Complete menu. But seem not compatible with realme xt. When setting equalizer, for virtualization, sound error happened. Else is, when touch bass then sound louder it self. But if we already sett all the things, playlist, equalizer, etc then only touch play then... Good enough

After using another music player app for years and years, and trying 100s of other apps that works the way I like to use it, looks like I found this app which can replace my current app. I like all the features implemented: one of the most I like is lyrics. If i don't have it, I can search online and get it. Another one is sleep timer - I like to sleep with music in my ears and this works perfectly fine. Stopping after few minutes. Here are some of the recommendations to improve this app: Hash player accepts the signals like play, pause, next, prev from my Bluetooth headphones, but it doesn't work with car's Bluetooth When playing folder wise, I can play specific folder and it's sub folders. But, it actually shuffles the order of songs. It would be nice to have option to keep in order by folders, such as all music files of folder 1, folder 2, folder 3 and so on. Obviously with shuffle, which is currently existing. Also,it would be nice to have option to delete music file from storage, directly from the playlist. So, if song is too old or someone got bored of that song can directly delete from the playlist and doesn't have to go to file explorer and find that song and delete.

Using 2-18-20 update? Does exactly what i need to learn languages. BUT, the elapsed time and total time fonts must be MUCH larger. Also, i would like to see the scrolling file name use a larger font. The blue box above the timeline with the music note is useless for me. Perhaps you could replace the blue box with a larger scrolling bar that goes across the entire width of the screen. 🙌. 2-28-20 This app just gets better as i learn to use it

Fantastic. This app is really great. First of all, it is moving to listen and enjoy every single song in my playlist. Next part is fit to song's lyrics. The last but not least, it has sleeptime, because I have problem about sleeping at night, so I need music to lure me and not waste my phone's battery too much such as googleplay music. That's all I like about this app. By the way, I think you guys should make some theme for this one because it's quite simple, I like somethings being colorful.

I love this app . Last night i installed this app and the good thing is it doesn't contain ads . The best part i find out in this music player is sleep timer and ringtone cutter . We can cut any part of song and set them as ringtone . This app has much more valuable features ...😍 Conclusion is that I'm happy with this app

title: Ticky Player: Media Player
description:
Ticky Player is a totally free multimedia player, you can play the videos locally or content hosted on remote servers, it is compatible with a multitude of video formats and playlists, its main function is to be able to add lists in .tick format, these lists in comparison with other types of lists has the advantage that their update is done automatically.

VIDEO COMPATIBILITY 

- .mp4
- .m3u
-. m3u8

LISTS COMPATIBILITY

- .tick
- Pastebin (Following the structure of the .tick lists)

PREMIUM VERSION

Subscription to Premium Version for only €0.99 the first month, then €1,99 per month and includes the following advantages:

✱ Remove advertising completely.

The price may vary depending on your location. Subscriptions will be charged to your credit or debit card through your Google Play account. Your subscription will be renewed automatically unless it is canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Manage your subscriptions in your Google Play account settings after purchase. You can find more information on how to manage your subscriptions in the links of interest at the end of this description sheet.

COPYRIGHT

Ticky Player is just a player, the application is completely empty, it does not include any type of content, any user can create, edit and share lists, using a text editor or a list generator, these lists are not generated within Ticky Player are url links with a JSON format, if you have found one or several lists that violates your copyright, we recommend contacting the owner of the lists in question to remove their content, since we do not take care of the creation and distribution of the ready we can not offer support, in addition we do not have any kind of relationship with the list creators.

LEGAL ATTRIBUTIONS

Ticky and the Ticky Player logo are trademarks of Obiwo Technology S.L.
Some images that appear in this description have the attribution of their respective owners in the section 'Open source' and is used as described in the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 license. More information: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/legalcode

LINKS OF INTEREST

Privacy policy: https://www.obiwo.com/apps/ticky/privacy/ES/
Open source: https://www.obiwo.com/apps/ticky/opensource/

title: ALLPlayer Video Player
description:
ALLPlayer is one of the most popular and generally downloaded video player for watching movies on Personal Computers. In Polish Internet Survey Megapanel Gemius - ALLPlayer is one of the the most commonly used applications.

Now ALLPlayer is also available for Android mobile devices. ALLPlayer for Android allows you to watch videos in all formats by using software and hardware decoding. ALLPlayer Android version, just like PC version, can download matching subtitles for movies.
The installer includes all the codecs (there is no need to download them later).

ALLPlayer - the best way to watch movies on the go.

- HARDWARE ACCELERATION - can be applied to more videos with the help of new H/W decoder.
- OPENSUBTITLES - subtitles downloader built in. 
- MOVIE INFO - automatic download and display of movie info.
- ADVANCED OSD - easy adjustment of advanced features on screen.

Player Suported Video formats:
- AVI, MP4, WMV, FLV, 3GP, MKV, M2TS,  MOV, MPG, MPEG, RM, RMVB, WMV, VOB, ASF, QuickTime, F4V, TS, HD, ...

Subtitles formats:
- DVD, DVB, SSA/ASS Subtitles tracks.
- SubStation Alpha (.ssa/.ass) with full styling.
- SubRip (.srt)
- MicroDVD (.sub/.txt)
- SubViewer2.0 (.sub)
- MPL2 (.mpl/.txt)
- PowerDivX (.psb/.txt)
- TMPlayer (.txt)

Navigation never made easier 
Self-explanatory interface without overloaded menus.


Colorful 
You can choose between three different main themes: white, dark and black for AMOLED displays. Select your favorite accent color from a color palette.

In-App
* In case of crash please reinstall
comments: I'm updating my review because the advice the developer gave me corrected 1 of my problems. Sadly, other problems persist. For example, when you put an artist with a large music catalog in your library, the app takes literally 10-12 seconds to load that artist's albums when you click on their name. And that's every time you click on them; not just the 1st time the app scans the files. Again, the app is gorgeous, but there's always a problem that makes me not want to use it. It's just too slow.

I have been using this app for years now. Recommended to several people. But it has been a nuisance lately. It does not detect new music I have downloaded even though they are .mp3 format. I've scanned the folders in which the music is present. It says 'cant open file' when I click on file through folders. The app crashes every time I open details of such files. It plays well nice in other default players with no issues. Will probably switch to a different player even though I don't want to.

UPDATE (3/3/2020): After the developer informed me of the issue with Android 10 concerning music players and music files stored on SD cards, I've updated my rating from 3 to 5 stars. While I still can't favorite any tracks, I found a way of working around the problem with the other playlists. I create the playlists in the stock LG music player app, which shows up in the Retro Music Player app (I have yet to try transferring my music files from SD card to the phone's internal storage). And the developer's suggestion that I use Google Photos to upload a photo for the avi instead of my phone's gallery also worked. Meanwhile, the app functions seamlessly on my tablet, which is running Android 7. PREVIOUS (3/2/2020): Retro Music Player is definitely one of the better music players out there. I love the level of customization afforded to users. However, I've noticed a new bug where everytime I try to favorite a track by tapping on the heart icon, the app crashes. I tried uninstalling and reinstalling but that didn't help. And, of lesser concern, is the inability to add a photo for the avi. The upload page loads forever and won't let me back out of it. I have to close the app and then wait a few seconds.

Lost all my playlists :( Overall this app is pretty good and has a nice interface but one morning I woke up to find all my playlists were gone. My music is still there and yes I can still remake the playlists but it is quite tedious and I am worried it will happen again so will not be using the app in future.

I'm not able to play sonngs from the songs tab. So i always go to album and start playing them. Or restart the app. Hope tgis can be resolved. I love your app. Using it since almost a year. Its a gift in this world of ad driven apps. Thank you. You've made my music experience pleasant.

title: EZ Folder Player Free
description:
Prefer to use folders to manage your music?
Always hard to find the music you want to play in the built-in music player?

This app is for you!
EZ Folder Player is an alternative music player based on folder structure.

Features:
* Simple and easy to use.
* Support shuffle & repeat mode.
* Provide 4x1 and 4x2 widgets.
* Sleep timer.
* Color theme select option.
* Support 3rd party Equalizer.
* Support notification and lock screen control.
(You have to change your lock screen setting to "Show all notification content" or "Hide sensitive notification content" on Android 5 and above.)

How to use:
* Browse your folders and select the music you want to start playing.
* You can play all the music in the folder by clicking the play button of the folder item.
* You can enable multi-select mode by long press on the list item.
* You can customize the initial folder.

* Send me an email if you'd like to help the translation, thanks!

comments: This music app is really good, because it plays folder files in order. the reason I'm not giving it five stars, is because every time my truck turns on, my Bluetooth connects and it starts playing. even if I don't have the app up. That's frustrating, and I'm deleting the app because of it.

Finally!!! So happy with this app. Ot displays my music according to MY folders, not forcing me to skip through files I don't want to see, or showing them is some other order. No annoying ads either. Can set the starting screen / root folder easily. Perfecto. Just loving this

This one is this one. Not invasive doesn't start and run on the background. Plays all the songs in a folder meta data not required if its a music file it plays it. I have had it installed maybe a year and use it to stream to blue tooth. So this is not a i just installed it review. Sammy S8 my battery lasted all day 30% left after 10 hours of Spotify, tune in radio, and mp3 listening. I use greenify I know what's running and what's killing my battery. This player is the good one.
Excelent player. Easy to use,great sound-and I'm Kinda fussy about these things-All is as described by the developer. This is my new default player.

Anyway to add volume track control to this app for non-rooted phones? I have another media player that uses it but I prefer your app. The app is called Lisna Music Folder Tree player and you can single click the volume buttons to go to the next or previous tracks, and double click the power button to pause/play music.  I tried separate media control apps, but they don't work well with non-rooted phones.  Thanks, d.

title: HD Video Player
description:
HD Video Player is a professional multimedia player for android phone and tablet. It supports ALL video formats, 4K/ultra HD videos, and plays them with high-definition, sound effect and subtitle. HD Video Player also protects your private videos from being seen or deleted wrongly by others.

KEY FEATURES:
● ALL formats, including MKV, MP4, M4V, AVI, MOV, 3GP, FLV, WMV, RMVB, TS etc.
● Play HD, full HD, 1080p and 4K video.
● Hardware acceleration.
● Protect private video with PIN code.
● subtitle downloader.
● Play video in pop-up window, split screen or background.
● Cast videos to TV with Chromecast.
● Equalizer for outstanding sound effects.

More amazing features of  HD Video Player:
● SD card support.
● Night mode and quick mute.
● Sound boost.
● Progress seek and resume.
● Ratio aspect remember.
● Sleep Timer & screen lock.
● Easy control with gesture.
● HD Video Player is for both android phone and tablet.
● Manage or share videos easily.

Floating Video Player
Video popup enables multitasking. The floating video player overrides other apps and it can be moved and resized easily. Enjoy video on the split-screen and use other apps as usual.

All Format Video Player
Play all format video & audio, including AVI, MP3, WAV, AAC, MOV, MP4, WMV, RMVB, FLAC, 3GP, M4V, MKV, TS, MPG, FLV, etc.

Video Player HD with slow motion
Video Player HD plays full HD & 4k video smoothly with slow motion. It is the easiest Video Player HD for android, free and powerful.

Background Video Player
Enjoy video on the background just like a music playback. Now you can enjoy the video and save battery for your phone.
 
Outstanding sound effects
Our app applied frequency equalizer, thus ensuring the speed and effectiveness of the video for you to personalize your audio experience.

HD Video Player for android tablet
Support all devices, watch videos on both android tablet and android phone.
 
Thank you for using HD Video Player. And your suggestions or problems are always welcomed. Please feel free to contact us at xplayer.feedback@gmail.com

title: Music player
description:
Music player or mp3 player is an indispensable application in your Android phone. What is a good music player app? It plays music, audio files smoothly. Beautiful graphic and show all music/mp3 on your phone.
This music player app is what you are looking for. Display all music formats: MP3, MP4, WAV, M4A, FLAC, 3GP, OGG, etc
Listening to music everyday is a good habit. Listen to music on this music player app give you better experience. Easy to find music, mp3 file, audio files. "Music player" scans all music in your mobile rapidly.
If you want to enhance sound to fit room space. You can adjust the audio equalizer.
Songs on "Music player" are displayed conveniently. There are many ways to search for a song: From song list, from artist list, from album list, browse by folder.

Main functions of free music player - mp3 player:
* Can show and play following file formats: mp3, m4a, wav, flac, ogg, acc, 3gp, etc. All songs in music libary will be shown.
* Powerful mp3 player with many other names: music player, song player, audio player, mp3 player.
* Many ways to find then play a song or an audio file. There are some quick lists: album, artist, genre, song, playlist, artist, directory
* Mini music player on lock screen. Show basic information: album photo, titles and artists. Include buttons in control bar like: play, pause, skip and stop.
* Support: Play, Delete, Edit songs. Has waiting queue of songs. Add music to the waiting list very easily.
* Can share your favorite songs to someone
* Music equalizer with many options. This MP3 player has bass boost, effects, etc. built-in equalizer will enhance your music listening experience.
* A lot of color themes to decorate mp3 music player with own style
* Remove bad music parts by editor. Edit - Crop or Trim music, cut audio. make better and smaller size, set music as ringtone or notification tone.
* Edit tag, can change song information: song title, album name or the artist name.
* headphone (traditional headphone and bluetooth headphone). All buttons on headphone are supported.
* Music library and hidden songs. In some music player app you can't see hidden audio files. In this app you can see them.
* Search. You can search by title (song name), album , artist, playlist.
* Playlist. Some actions can do: Add new, update, delete playlists. Add album, artist, song, genre directory to playlist. Has recent playlists.
* Music player widget. it is a mini mp3 player.
* Show picture of song, photo of artist and cover of album.

I believe that this free music player bring best experience in listening audio files (mp3 and other song formats).
I try my best to make this music player working stablely, smoothly. But if you find a problem with mp3 player please send me feedback.

* Playlist. Some actions can do: Add new, update, delete playlists. Add album, artist, song, genre directory to playlist. Has recent playlists.
* Music player widget. it is a mini mp3 player.
* Show picture of song, photo of artist and cover of album.

I believe that this free music player bring best experience in listening audio files (mp3 and other song formats).
I try my best to make this music player working stablely, smoothly. But if you find a problem with mp3 player please send me feedback.
summary: Music player,Free music player,Play all song formats, Edit tag,Trim music - mp3
developerAddress: Ha noi
comments: Worked for the 1st 3 weeks on my New phone couldn't fault it now for what ever reason it won't play the songs of my SD card but I can play them through my files don't know if it's a app problem or a phone problem disappointed had to uninstall try something else overall a good app
I like this more than Google Play Music and the only thing that's bothering me is that the queue isn't as customisable as Google Play's queue. If the queue was better I would definitely give it a 5*.
I'm just beginning to use this app, but I liked so far. Good design and features. Congrats! I just wish there were an option to add more than one song at time to a playlist.
Apparently the best music experience ever with all those themes and libraries. Not annoying with ads
I was looking for an app that would allow me to transfer music from my ipod. This worked for me. Thanks!

title: Shuttle Music Player
description:
Shuttle Music Player is an intuitive, lightweight and powerful open source music player for Android.

🔹 Features:

• Modern, Material design
• Built in 6-band equalizer with bass boost
• Gapless playback
• Lyrics (embedded lyrics only, for legal reasons)
• Automatic artwork downloading
• Tons of theme options, including light & dark mode
• Sleep timer
• Extremely customizable widgets
• Last.fm Scrobbling
• Open source

"Shuttle doesn't try to reinvent the music playing wheel — it embraces it" - AndroidPolice.com

"Shuttle Music Player builds on the strengths of Google Play Music and adds useful, everyday features." - softonic.com

"... the right balance between simple and intuitive, and feature rich at the same time." - androidcommunity.com

Note: In-app purchase is available for upgrading to the pro version of the app.

🔹 Paid Features: (Shuttle+)

• ID3 tag editing
• Folder browsing
• Chromecast support
• Extra themes

Shuttle Music Player contains everything you need in a music player... and a little bit more. It is the music player of choice for your Android device!

Check out http://www.shuttlemusicplayer.com for more info.

comments: This AP does NOT work AT ALL. I paid for the app and have been working with it for 4 hours and it still hasn't played a single song, cannot load a song onto a playlist, and cannot add a folder to a playlist. Each action generates an error message that hundreds of others have complained about on forums (about the playlist being empty). Don't waste your time or money.

Quite nice music player: you can find all the features a regular app in the same category has and it works smooth. Althouh I miss the settings for notifications and lock screen cover notification bar also didn't show for me. 😕 It would be a nice feature to integrate cloud storage or streaming music services into the app, too. 🤞
Great player but the app crashes everytime I try to add a song to a playlist.

Best look that I have ever seen, and I tried many. Easy to share music. In short, it does what most players do but looks better. However, I cannot seem to delete a single song from a playlist. All that I see is an option to delete an entire playlist, which is annoying. Therefore, making playlists is a nightmare if you forgot that a song was already there. It adds duplicates! Additionally, it does not automatically add art, and freezes constantly. This should be fixed as soon as possible.

Not perfect with the configuring of music files, so ask away on the subreddit, but it's really sleek for it's price (free or $2), sleeker than Spotify. Use Automatag, the app, for extra help with tagging things. We've come a long way in Mobile music player user interfaces since the first mp3 players and iPods, and this one is my favorite so far.

title: PlayerX Video Player
description:
PlayerX - The best video player.I believe we can surprise you again and again.
Main features:
1) Automatically scan SDCard video files  and generate thumbnails.
2) Snapshot:you can get and save snapshot of video,when playing.
3) Multi-floating windows :Support multiple floating windows video at the same time
4) Pinch to zoom : Easily zoom in and out by pinching and swiping across the screen.
5) Child lock:long click the lock button,Lock input.
6) Speed playback : Play video at your favorite speed.fast or slow playback of video.
7) Hardware decoding: Have the latest hardware decoder, more videos can benefit from hardware acceleration.
8) Multicore & multithreaded decoding: PlayerX  is the Android video player which supports multi-core and multithreaded decoding. is a multi-core and multi-threaded decoding video player. Test result proved that dual-core device’s performance is better up to 70% than that of single-core devices.
9) Support for almost all video files  such as:webm,m3u8, avi, flv, mkv, mov, mpg, mts, mp4, m4v, rmvb, rm,wmv, 3gp, 3gpp, vob, f4v,asf...
10) Support multiple languages:German,French,Russian,Polish,English,Japanese,Chinese(Simplified &Traditional).

title: Video Player for Android: All Format Video Player
description:
📹 Video Player for Android™ is a free professional HD video playback tool that plays most of the multimedia files (Videos and MP3) on your Android™ tablet and Android™ phone. It also helps you in protecting your private videos from being deleted and unauthorized use, you can easily lock your videos in Private Video Lock. Supports most of the file formats including MKV, MP4, AVI, MOV, Ogg, FLAC, TS, M2TS, Wv, and AAC. Now with this Feb update, you can also use this Video Player as a Music Player to Play your MP3 files. You can easily create your playlists and cast your videos to TV. All codecs are included with no separate downloads. It supports subtitles download in multiple languages. This app is a free and cross-platform multimedia player that plays most multimedia files both videos and mp3. It's a full HD video player for Android™ that also supports music playback. Please do not confuse it with an online Video Player or Music Player and do not give us bad ratings.

KEY FEATURES:
● Support ALL Video Formats, including WMV, WEBM, MKV, MP4, M4V, AVI, MOV, 3GP, FLV, WMV, RMVB, TS, OGG etc.
● Music Player: Now supports most of the MP3 music files playback.
● Lock Videos Privately: Lock your personal videos in a Private Folder that only you can access. The player supports Fingerprint, Pin & Pattern Lock.
● Support Dark & Light Themes with Automatic DayNight mode that switches to night mode at an appropriate time.
● Playlist: Create a Playlist for your music files.
● Playback Controls: Easily control all your video playback directly from the player, while playing the video or mp3 music.
● In Build File Manager: Supports a robust file manager to access all videos in your directories in Internal and External storage.
● Variable Playback Speed: Play video in variable speeds ranging from 0.5 to 2.0, and supports all major video formats.
● Play In Background: Continue video playback in the background when turning device screen off or clicking the HOME button.
● Picture in Picture Mode: Continue video playback in PiP Mode when you switch to other apps from video playback.
● Volume & Brightness Control: Easily control Volume and brightness and remember brightness and volume settings for all videos.
● Auto Video Play: Automatically play next video when current video ends. You can easily set ON/OFF this in player settings.
● Subtitle Downloads: Subtitle downloads in a different language. Supports more than 60 subtitle language download.
● Video Casting Support: Supports video casting on the device which supports casting like Android Smart TV and other smart devices.
● Enable/Disable Audio Track: Enable/Disable audio track will start/stop audio playing in a video. You can easily change this while playing video.
● Video Screen Orientation: Supports different video screen orientation like, Automatic(sensor based), Locked at the start, Landscape, Portrait.
● PlayBack History: Save all your played media in the History section, you can check anytime when and which media you played.
● Media Cover On Lock Screen: When available, set the current media cover art as lock screen wallpaper.If no artwork is available no media will be set on the lock screen.
● Detect Headset: Pause on headset removal, resume on headset insertion, you can easily set in ON/OFF in settings, works with Music Player only.

Video Player for Android is intended for everyone and is totally free and always will be. This is a perfect player that improves video quality and upscale video watching experience. You can easily watch 720 HD Viral Videos with this app and listen to your favorite music and songs.
Your feedback is very important to us. Please subscribe or email us directly at toolsground@gmail.com if you have any problems with your video and music playbacks.
All trademark(including logo, name, badges) are the property of their respective owners. Used here only to guide and help users.
Note: This app is a Video Player with MP3 support not an app for reproduction of videos.

title: Lua Player - Video Player, Media, HD Popup
description:
☆ Are you looking for a Handy and less limited multitasking popup media player ?

With re-sizing in popup window and multitasking feature, Lua Player is by far the most powerful media player on android market. This supports "Real multi-tasking" with "Picture in Picture" mode. 

Lua Player is a free and it plays most multimedia files and various streaming protocols. It is supporting most codec with containers including MP4, AVI and more. File subtitles and online subtitles is supporting and multi-audio selection as well.

Just enjoy the video and do anything else at the same time with this video player.

Real multitasking means not just supporting a floating window, but supporting all menu and functionalities from pop-up window!


☆ Main Features
★ MULTITASKING with FLOATING WINDOW
• Easy to resize and move to any screen positions! Play your videos with game or chatting screen.
• Can start from external file managers with popup window mode, which is the most beneficial feature among video player apps.

★ HD VIDEO PLAYER
• Supporting high quality videos including 720p, 1080p and more, which depends on hardware and software decoder.

★ AUDIO PLAYER WITH POPUP
• Now Audio play with floating window mode supported !!

★ HIDE WINDOW AND BACKGROUND PLAY 
• Hiding and Restoring window any time, any place is the definitely unique feature for multitasking and only from this media player !

★ PLAYBACK SPEED CONTROL
• 0.3x ~ 4.0x ( 0.7x ~ 1.5x for free version )

★ SEARCH VIDEO AND AUDIO
• Query video or audio with your keywords to local storage

★ SCREEN CAPTURE & SCREEN ROTATION
• Supporting screen capture and screen rotation during playing video files

★ Network media play through SMB (SAMBA)
• Video and Audio are available from window share or NAS via SMB 

★ Beautiful UI & THEMES
• Beautiful user experience within complicated multitasking popup window media player.

★ BETTER USER INTERFACE
• AB Repeat mode and auto-resize subtitle in accordance with window size are supporting. You can control BRIGHTNESS and VOLUMN even current VIDEO POSITION by gesture

★ EASY TO SAVE YOUR FAVORITE VIDEOS
• Very easy to add, delete your favorite Video from local media files and from streaming url

★ Support for most video, audio file formats and codec.
★ Support for most subtitle file formats with online subtitle.
★ Supports network streaming.
★ Automatic detect videos on device and from micro SD card.


☆ Video Codecs
• H.264, H.265, H.263, MPEG4, XVID, VP6, VP8, MPEG-1, MPEG-2 and etc


☆ Audio Codecs
• AAC, AC3, Vorbis, MP3, MP2, WMA, FLAC and etc
• Multi-audio selection supported.


☆ Network Stream
• RTSP, RTP, RTMP
• HTTP
• MMS
• HTTP Live Streaming with multiple bit rates (m3u8)
• Supports SMB/CIFS (SAMBA) 

☆ Subtitle
• SAMI(.smi), .ssa/.ass, SubViewer(.sub), Subrip(.srt), MicroDVD(.sub)
• Unicode Multibyte charset supported.

☆ Permissions
• Read phone status an identity: to pause player when receiving incoming calls. It needs for floating player being resized.
• Modify or delete the contents of your USB storage: to delete media files and thumbnails when receiving user action
• Full network access: To open network streams.
• View network connections: To see network state.
• Prevent phone/tablet from sleeping: to prevent your phone or device from sleeping during playback.
• Draw over other apps: to draw floating window over any position.


Some of the screens are from the Big Buck Bunny licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 3.0.
(c) copyright 2008, Blender Foundation / www.bigbuckbunny.org

Some of the screens are from the Sintel licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 3.0.
(c) copyright Blender Foundation | www.sintel.org

• Hiding and Restoring window any time, any place is the definitely unique feature for multitasking and only from this media player !

★ PLAYBACK SPEED CONTROL
• 0.3x ~ 4.0x ( 0.7x ~ 1.5x for free version )

★ SEARCH VIDEO AND AUDIO
• Query video or audio with your keywords to local storage

★ SCREEN CAPTURE & SCREEN ROTATION
• Supporting screen capture and screen rotation during playing video files

★ Network media play through SMB (SAMBA)
• Video and Audio are available from window share or NAS via SMB

★ Beautiful UI & THEMES
• Beautiful user experience within complicated multitasking popup window media player.

★ BETTER USER INTERFACE
• AB Repeat mode and auto-resize subtitle in accordance with window size are supporting. You can control BRIGHTNESS and VOLUMN even current VIDEO POSITION by gesture

★ EASY TO SAVE YOUR FAVORITE VIDEOS
• Very easy to add, delete your favorite Video from local media files and from streaming url

★ Support for most video, audio file formats and codec.
★ Support for most subtitle file formats with online subtitle.
★ Supports network streaming.
★ Automatic detect videos on device and from micro SD card.


☆ Video Codecs
• H.264, H.265, H.263, MPEG4, XVID, VP6, VP8, MPEG-1, MPEG-2 and etc


☆ Audio Codecs
• AAC, AC3, Vorbis, MP3, MP2, WMA, FLAC and etc
• Multi-audio selection supported.


☆ Network Stream
• RTSP, RTP, RTMP
• HTTP
• MMS
• HTTP Live Streaming with multiple bit rates (m3u8)
• Supports SMB/CIFS (SAMBA)

☆ Subtitle
• SAMI(.smi), .ssa/.ass, SubViewer(.sub), Subrip(.srt), MicroDVD(.sub)
• Unicode Multibyte charset supported.

☆ Permissions
• Read phone status an identity: to pause player when receiving incoming calls. It needs for floating player being resized.
• Modify or delete the contents of your USB storage: to delete media files and thumbnails when receiving user action
• Full network access: To open network streams.
• View network connections: To see network state.
• Prevent phone/tablet from sleeping: to prevent your phone or device from sleeping during playback.
• Draw over other apps: to draw floating window over any position.

(c) copyright 2008, Blender Foundation / www.bigbuckbunny.org

Some of the screens are from the Sintel licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 3.0.
(c) copyright Blender Foundation | www.sintel.org

recentChanges: Update: Internal update
comments: Not a bad app, loved that it can play along with other videos which is lacking in other PIP apps. Helpful when I watch YouTube and some game ads at the same time. Dissapointed by lack of background play, though.
Very very very useful app If there's an option to change the frame rate of subtitles, it'll be great

Best floating app ever , the developer must be a real genius , I've tried so many apps in that type and wasn't realy happy with none of them , i always watch videos while doing other things on my tablet so finding this app really helped me to do some few works simultaneously cause it has all the options you need. Big thanks

... and after testing about a 100 video players during the last 100 days, i finally got you Lua Player! the best since the good ol' VLC! 😉A KJ's buddy! 6 galleries of simultaneous videos at click to play are handed down flawlessly! 😍 It's now a "must not forget to be installed member" of all my Android gadgets collection. 101 🌟s and salute goes to the genius developer. Meticulously done and highly recommended, Cheers! 🍻👍😁👍

I have been using it maybe a month now and have had no issues. I download movies/music & can play both with Lua. I can turn my screen off, it will still play. It auto pauses when you watch a YT video or a video in browser, then resumes as soon as the video stops. Which I like, I don't have to go back and press play. The picture in picture or the hovering screen is perfectly dimensioned and not too small.. You have to go into settings to turn the option to continue where you left off. Great apa!

title: Mix Video Player
description:
Mix Player is a professional video and music playback tool. It is one of the best video and music player for android phone, and android tablet. Mix Player also protects your private video from being deleted or seen when people use your device.

FEATURES:
• All video formats are supported, including MKV, MP4, M4V, AVI, MOV, 3GP, FLV, WMV, RMVB etc.
• All audio formats are supported, including WAV, MP3, OGG, FLAC, APE, WV, ACC, M4A, WMA etc.
• Ultra high-definition video player, support 4K.
• Private Folder - keep your video safe.
• Cast videos to TV with Chromecast.
• Support subtitle download and select form file.
• Adjust video and audio playback speed.
• Two different UI themes to select
• Media library for audio and video files, and allows to browse folders directly
• Easy to control volume, brightness and playing progress.
• Multi video playback option: auto-rotation, aspect-ratio, screen-lock etc. 
• Widget for audio control
• Support play video as audio mode
• Supports audio headsets control

Permission Details :
• It needs "read the contents of your USB storage", in to order to read your media files on it.
• It needs "modify or delete the contents of your USB storage", in order to allow deletion of files and store subtitles.
• It needs "full network access", to open network and internet streams.
• It needs "prevent phone from sleeping" in order to prevent your phone from sleeping when watching a video.
• It needs "change your audio settings", in order to change audio volume.
• It needs "modify system settings", in order to allow you to change your audio ringtone.
• It needs "control vibration" to give feedback on the controls.
• It needs "run at startup" to set recommendations on Android TV launcher screen

title: Boom: Music Player, Bass Booster & Equalizer
description:
Boom is a powerful Music Player with a magical 3D surround sound, powerful Bass and an advanced Equalizer

• Immerse yourself in your favorite music with 3D surround sound experience!
• Use handcrafted equaliser presets for every genre or create your own custom preset!
• Listen to your favourite tracks in Spotify and TIDAL or your own music collection on device or on cloud (Google Drive & Dropbox)
• Enjoy over 20,000 Radio channels and Podcasts
• Get immersive surround sound experience on ANY headphones!
• Create your own Equalizer setting using the 16-band or 8-Band Equalizer
• Play Hi-Res audio revealing extraordinary audio details in 3D mode
• Enjoy your drive with magical 3D Music experience with Android Auto support

Here’s Boom, a Music app worthy of being your default Music Player!

Magical 3D Surround Sound
Boom uses a patent-pending 3D audio technology to deliver the most realistic and immersive music experience on ANY headsets! It extracts spatial cues from your music to render them in three-dimensional clarity for an extremely intense listening experience.
 
Stream Spotify and TIDAL with Boom
You can stream all your music from Spotify and TIDAL through Boom with all the Boom effects! Experience music with unbeatable quality, anytime, anywhere!
Note: Spotify and TIDAL requires premium subscription plans of the respective services.

20,000+ Radio and 20,000+ Podcast Stations Worldwide
Boom Android gives you the access to over 20,000 local and international radio stations and 20,000+ podcast stations across 120 countries! Tune in to your favorite station for free, whenever and wherever you want!

Play music from your device or Cloud
Boom lets you stream or download your music directly from your Dropbox and Google Drive with all the effects.

Handcrafted Equalizer Presets
Music buffs, be delighted to know that Boom comes equipped with 22-handcrafted Equalizer presets for all popular genres of music. Select the one based on your mood and taste, and get high on your music with more colors.

Custom Equalizer settings
Create your own Equalizer setting using the 8-Band Equalizer

Hi-Res Audio Support
Play your Hi-Res audio files in 3D. Supported formats include AIFF, FLAC, ALAC, WAV, DSF

Boom Android has a sleek and easy-to-use interface that is simple and intuitive to use.  So, whether the beat gets dropped or the tempo amplifies, with BOOM you don’t have to worry! You can get high on your music always and FEEL YOUR MUSIC like you’ve never had! This pretty yet mighty music player brings you a whole new audio quality that the Android users have never experienced!

Be a part of the audio revolution and join us to change the way you listen!
Don’t forget to leave your positive reviews and ratings to further encourage us :) 
Like us, follow us and share your experience with Boom on social media.

Twitter - https://twitter.com/boomapp
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/boomapp
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/boomaudioapp

comments: This is such a wonderful app!! My previous phone (LG V20) had all the equalizers you have here in it's default music app. One issue I've found is that the audio quality's much better when any song's playing in the background while I'm playing a game than when the song's in the background of any other non-game. Is this happening only with my phone? I've checked all battery and performance related settings and it's still the same. Give me an answer and I'll give ya the 5 stars you truly deserve

I think this app is GREAT. Great job to the ones who made this app. I had an earphone with disgusting bass and all. Then I found this app, it's a big help to my earphone and the music it plays. Thank you soo much for this app. I'm only 15 but if I was a adult I would pay you so much money for this. Thank youuu.😂😊😊

I appreciate the 3D Surround experience and the customizable EQ with a graphic effect in this app. But I have some concerns which are constantly disturbing me to enjoy this app. 1. The app closes the moment the phone screen sleeps. Really annoying. 2. To add songs to a playlist why not have a select tab to select whatever songs/folder to be added / deleted from the playlist tan go one by one. 3. There is no cross fade to enjoy back to back play. I am on full subs. Other apps work in sleep mode.

P1500 for a lifetime license? you probably did not know root users can have much better sound experience than this thru viper4android.. and on playerstore only xplayer 3d can emulate that capability same clarity, 3d sound and good bass without root at half of your "lifetime" price.. i don't even feel the 3d virtual sound about this app and controls are very limited.

Won't find local music in folders that the likes of PowerAmp and Omnia have no issues with, and there's no way to point the app to local music folders either. With much better options available this seems like a pointless app. In this case, MP3 and WMA audio files in a folder called "Music" with multiple sub-folders on an external SD card is completely ignored by Boom. The media is seen fine by PowerAmp, Omnia, VLC, GoneMad, Pi and is found by AZ Media Scanner.

title: Music player
description:
Music player app is one of the best mp3 player for android.  Music, audio files are played smoothly. It is beautiful and free.
App supports music formats: MP3, MP4, WAV, M4A, FLAC, 3GP, OGG, etc

App was organized to help listen to music easier, "Music player" scans all music in your mobile rapidly.
Best audio equalizer improves your sound on speaker in any space
Supports the latest Dolby Atmos audio technology (but on some devices this feature is not available).
Listening to songs on "Music player" will give better mood and better life.

Features of free music player - mp3 player:
* Almost music formats are supported (mp3, m4a, wav, flac ...). Detect all music files in android mobile.
* Offline music player, song player, audio player, powerful mp3 player with high quality.
* Browse and play audio, music via a convenient menu. The menu has many items such as: album, artist, genre, song, playlist, artist, directory and album.
* Notification bar - mini music player on lock screen. Show album artwork, titles and artists. Include buttons in control bar like: play, pause, skip and stop.
* Play next song automatically. Queue of songs is supported. Add music to the waiting list very easily.
* Send or share your favorite songs to your friends via emails, social networks ...
* Has equalizer with great sound. This MP3 player has bass boost, reverb effects, etc, built-in equalizer will enhance your music listening experience.
* Many backgrounds to make mp3 music player more beautiful
* Edit - Crop or Trim music, cut audio. make better and smaller size, set music as ringtone or notification tone.
* Edit the song information, you can change song details for example: song title, album name or the artist name.
* Work well with headset or headphone. All buttons on headset was supported. Don't need to touch on your device.
* Music library. All of audio music, songs in libary will be shown.
* Search feature. Search by title (song name), album , artist, playlist.
* Playlist. Users are able to add a new playlist, edit or delete an old playlist. Add album, artist, song, genre directory to playlist. Has recent playlists.
* Bluetooth control. Compatible with bluetooth headphone or headset. Support all controls like rewind, next, pause, stop, play
* Music player widget. Let's pick widgets to home screen for better experience.
* Support mp3 file. Mp3 is the most popular music format. So we also call as mp3 player or audio player.
* Show photo of song, artist and cover of album.

Please download and explore more functions.
We hope this free music player bring you more comfortable in listening audio files.

If you love music player app please write some reviews to encourage us.

title: Music Player
description:
Music Player with powerful equalizer, Quick search all your music files and music videos/MV, customize background skin and themes, is the best free music player, over millions downloads in all over the world, now free download music player/audio player.

Music player is not only based on artists or albums, but also based on the folder structure. Music Player will guide you find all the music files in seconds, and supports you quick search relative music videos/MV through artist or track.
The best free music player and media player! 
Replaceable background skin/theme make the Music Player extraordinarily brilliant.
The unique equalizer make your music sounds more professional. You are free to control the music style and enjoy your musical.

Key Features:
* Support all the most popular music file formats.
* Browse and play your music by albums, artists, songs, genre, playlists, folders.
* Support quick search hot free music video/MV.
* Quick search and watch the relative free music videos through artist/track.
* Powerful equalizer. More than 22+ pre-set music tone styles for your choice(Normal, Classic, Dance, Folk, Heavy, Hip hop, Jazz,  Pop, Rock...)
* Custom tone music style and manually adjust the equalizer. 
* 3 home screen WIDGETS (4x1,2x2,4x1).
* Support Lyric files. Automatic scanning all the lyric files , and matching. 
* Replaceable background skin or theme, 22+ Gorgeous background skins for your choice. You also can set your gallery photo as background. 
* Support notification status: show album artwork, play/pause, skip forward in notification status.
* SHAKE phone to change playing music : give your phone a shake to play next/previous song
* Free to re-edit album, artist name and genre.
* Edit song file and save as ringtone, free to make sound now.
* Support music file Multi-select operation.
* Smart remember last play playlist.
* Headset support. 
* Easy SEARCH. Find all your local music files never been so easy.
* Custom and save your Playlist
* Headset/Bluetooth Controls

Hope everybody can enjoy the different music play experience.
PLEASE NOTE:
This app is not a online music downloader, we not support free download songs service.

Great app but would be nice if you could do casting with it! I have my TV hooked up to my stereo so if I could cast it would be perfect! Hence the 3 star rating.

title: Video Player All Format - OPlayer
description:
★ ★ ★ Under development for 8 Years! ★ ★ ★
★ ★ ★ DTS & DivX officially supported! ★ ★ ★

Video Player - OPlayer is a professional video playback tool. It supports ALL video formats, 4K/ultra HD video files, and plays them with high-definition. It is one of the best HD video player for android tablet and android phone. Video Player - OPlayer also protects your private video from being deleted or seen when people use your device.

KEY FEATURES:
● Support ALL video formats, including MKV, MP4, M4V, AVI, MOV, 3GP, FLV, WMV, RMVB, TS etc.
● Ultra HD video player, support 4K.
● Hardware acceleration.
● Keep your video safe with private folder.
● Cast videos to TV with Chromecast.
● Support subtitle downloader and more.
● Play video in pop-up window, split screen or back-ground.
● Night Mode, Quick Mute & Playback Speed.
● Identify ALL video files on your device and SD Card automatically.
● Manage or share videos easily.
● Easy to control volume, brightness and playing progress.
● Multi playback option: auto-rotation, aspect-ratio, screen-lock etc. 
● Video player hd for both android tablet and android phone.


All Format Video Player
Play all format video, including MKV, MP4, M4V, AVI, MOV, 3GP, FLV, WMV, RMVB, TS etc.

HD Video Player
Play HD, full HD & 4k video smoothly, moreover play video in slow motion.

Floating Video Player
Video popup enables multitasking. The floating video player overrides other apps and it can be moved and resized easily. Enjoy video on the split-screen and use other apps as usual.

Background Video Player
Enjoy video on the background just like a music playback. Now you can watch a video in the way of listening to books.

Video Player for android tablet
Support all devices, watch videos on both android tablet and android phone.

Video player with casting to TV
Video player for Chromecast. Cast videos to android TV with Chromecast easily. It’s the best chromecast apps for android free.

Easy to use
Easy to control volume, brightness and playing progress by sliding on playback screen.

Files manager
Identify ALL video files on your device and SD Card automatically. In addition, manage or share videos easily.

Video Player - OPlayer is a PAID HD video player for android, simple and powerful. Any video formats are supported. All-in-one media player for different formats. We are open to any suggestions for better user experience. Please feel free to contact us at olimsoft@gmail.com

title: Da Player - Video and live stream player
descriptionHTML:
Watch your videos, live streams, protected video content trough Da Player. Add them one by one or in playlists.

Also good for developers who want to test or distribute their content without building an app.

Supports .flv, .f4v, .ts, .mpeg, .mp4, .m4v, .mkv, .mov, .webm, .m3u8, .mpd, .aac, .amr, .f4a, .ogg, .mp3, .m4a, .opus, .flac, .wav, .m3u and .json files generated trough da-player.com.

Features:
- Add protected .json playlists generated through da-player.com;
- Add live video and audio streams;
- Add online video and audio files;
- Add local video and audio files;
- Add items as favorites for easy access;
- Search option;
- Custom audio and video codecs for some formats;
- DVB subtitle support;
- Audio and Video tracks support;
- Floating pop-up player window;
- Option to choose default subtitle and audio languages;
- Chromecast support;
- Delete playlists or individual items in local playlists;
- Option to share playlists;
- Volume and brightness controls in player;
- Orientation and aspect ratio options in player;
- Support for non-touch devices including Android TV;

Please note that Da Player does not provide any content and is not responsible for the quality of the content you add and watch through the app.
summary: Watch your videos, live streams and protected videos

comments: For the money it is great service. However, I paid the subscription on my phone and should have it enabled on other devices, that's not the case. Secondly last week the most watched sport site Max sports channels are not working. Seems the developers created it and let it go without support. I even tried to contact them but no response.
Total waste of money! I have been paying for this app for a while, but when I want to watch mostly football always get this error: "Error occurred when trying to play the media file. null"

The service is totally ruined. When switching channels there is a big delay. After 3-4 switchings the application completely stops working. What is going on. The support team doesn't respond at all. If this does not change and will opt out !!! No feedback at all. Is this good customer support?

The app keeps breaking even when I'm on monthly subscription and pay regularly. Something has to be done, is just horrible to watch games or a movies. Come on guys, do something about it or i will just cancel my subscription.
I am using the paid version and It was good, but I don't know what they did with this app. It started to switch very slow between channels (the delay is too long) and it crashes very often.

title: n7player Music Player
description:
n7player Music Player is an intuitive audio player giving you an innovative way to browse your music. It provides advanced features in a user-friendly interface.

Quick access to currently playing songs allows for total control in a handy way. Because the ease of use, this app is perfect for beginners but its countless features will satisfy even the most demanding and advanced users.

All music at your fingertips
Don't search for your music, with n7player you have access to your whole library in a friendly and intuitive way controlled by simple gestures. Handles all most popular formats including FLAC and OGG.
Unique n7player's surface is not the only way of browsing through your music library. Play by directories or sort in a more old-school way - albums/artists/tracks. 

High quality audio
Thanks to the advanced 10-band equalizer with many presets to choose from and the possibility of creating your own, enjoy your music in high-quality. Tune bass & treble to your liking, enable volume normalization, adjust channel balance and everything you need.

Customize every aspect
Personalizing is your thing? Customize every single element of your player - from changing whole themes, through widgets to lockscreen.

Collect and manage
Playlists are one of the easiest and most effective ways of listening to your favorite music. Keeping this in mind, we have built n7player with this idea as the heart of the player.

Tag editor, album art grabber, scrobbling...
We know how important it is to have the entire library with all the details - album arts, tags, lyrics. Tag editor is a simple but full-featured tool that allows you to correct information contained in your audio files. Use a built-in album art grabber to beautify your music library.

n7player is more than a simple music player. There are far more features than that – read below for the full list.

Here's a list of selected features of n7player - audio player.
PLAYBACK FEATURES
• Plays all most popular filetypes:
mp3, mp4, m4a, ogg, wav, 3gp, mid, xmf, ogg, mkv*, flac**, aac**
• Full-featured, 10 band equalizer:
tunable bass and treble, built-in presets with possibility of creating your own, pre-amp, channel balance, audio normalizations, surround effects and SRS (if available on your device)
• Control what you play:
apart from basic stuff like repeat once, repeat all, shuffle all, n7player adds easily accessible current queue of tracks
• And more:
gapless playback, timer, playback resume...

BROWSING FEATURES
• Intuitive and user-friendly music surface:
your whole music in an artist cloud which zooms-in into an album wall
• Filter your music library:
control which artists show up, limit your library to the specified folders, hide albums you don't want to see
• Personalize your experience:
use your favorite skin, select most suitable widget, install our free music visualizer (BLW), change your lockscreen...
• Browse through folders, old-school library is here too:
sort your library by artists/albums/tracks/genres, browse your folders and manage them
• Cover auto-grabber:
getting your missing album arts will help browsing your library

CONTROL WHAT YOU PLAY
• Full playlist support:
create, modify or use automatically created ones
• Control your music with a buttons on your headset:
fully configurable buttons on your headset
• Do it your way:
control through notifications, widgets, headset buttons, lockscreen...

EXTENDABLE
• Stream your music to other devices:
n7player connected to ToasterCast allows you to listen to your music on external devices through ChromeCast/AirPlay/DLNA
• Music visualizer:
Connect n7player to our music visualizer – BLW - to bring your homescreen alive through music
• Song lyrics:
Thanks to a free third-party add-on, you can add lyrics to all your songs
• More stuff coming in the future!

*) available on Android 4.0+
**) available on Android 3.1+

developerAddress: Bukowińska 12/1301, 02-703 Warsaw, Poland
recentChanges:
IMPORTANT: Please update unlocker to latest version.

We are back with more updates. For now we concentrate on fixing things that went broken over last year:
- fixed bugs and ANRs, compatibility with Android 9 & 10
- increase performance, reduced app size (up to 50%)
- 64 bit decoding
- fixed back button behavior
- many internal library changes
- adaptive icon added
- now requires Android 4.1 or above

Full changelog here: http://n7player.com/changelog/
comments: I'm not a huge fan of the surface interface, at least let us theme the text color so it's less in your face. But I only bought this app to play music while I'm on a call and it looks like it works great at task! If there were a way to login to streaming music services like Amazon through the app so we can stream while on a call, this app would be 👌🏼

Like that it has a L-R balance which few have. Can't play the audio part of an Mp4 music video. The home screen list of folders is useless to me. Like many others it can't find my music for me but like that there is a file mgr type folder browse. The player functions are excellent but finding the main screen of the song playing is quirky. Suggest the author look at Bits Mp3 Player for a simpler way to navigate to places.

Had this for years. Best sound control from any other player. The theft protection check is a bit much. I've gotten on flights and it's useless. I have to make sure it's active before boarding. Hope he thinks of another way. Many users seem to have problems but I've been good on my note 8. It sounds awesome at home with a Bluetooth link and my home audio system.

This player deserves 5 stars, but the following issues are really bothering me, plus my mail to their help center is still un answered, for 3 weeks. The issues are 1. Cannot arrange the library in last modified mode, after scanning all the albums /artists gets shuffled, thus very difficult to pin point the lastest albums added, this issue happens in all modes, like artists. 2. Albums with multiple, collaborations, gets hayware and becomes individual albums or artists, this is highly irritating.

The player and its library capabilities are nice. Love that I'm not marketed to and notified of things constantly. This is mostly why I picked this player (No marketing and ads). However, 2 annoyances are: 1) the music doesn't stop if you close the app. Especially annoying when it starts on it's own for whatever reason and you have to go search for the app on your phone then hit pause. 2) the app navigation is quirky. Not very fluid.
